meta.title: Bay Area Wedding Venues Guide
meta.description: Comprehensive list of wedding venues in Bay Area (California) and Europe (Portugal, Italy, Greece, Spain, Switzerland, France)

venues.name: Charles Krug Winery
venues.description: California's oldest winery (1861) offering historic charm with vineyard views. One of only five Napa wineries legally permitted to host weddings. Features the Carriage House with vaulted ceilings and reclaimed wine barrel wood.

videos.title: Charles Krug Winery Wedding Video
Stunning Charles Krug Winery Wedding

reviews.summary: Staff praised as responsive and professional. Beautiful upstairs reception hall. Note: Beer/wine only, no liquor. Events must end at 10pm.

venues.name: V. Sattui Winery
venues.description: Award-winning Tuscan-style winery named among Top Five Winery Wedding Venues in The World. Features a stunning barrel room lit with candles and gorgeous florals throughout.

videos.title: V Sattui Winery Wedding Film

reviews.summary: Fairy-tale barrel room setting. Events allowed until 11pm. Mixed reviews on catering quality during peak season.

venues.name: Viansa Sonoma Winery
venues.description: Tuscan architecture with breathtaking Sonoma Valley views. Features romantic courtyard, Pavilion, and Barrel Room. Staff receives extremely high praise for attentiveness.

videos.title: Viansa Winery Wedding

reviews.summary: Magical sunset views during cocktail hour. Requires full-service wedding planner. Can be windy in late summer.

venues.name: Beringer Vineyards
venues.description: Historic Victorian winery founded in 1876. Features the Rhine House mansion with 17th-century German-style architecture and stunning gardens.

videos.title: Taylor & Joshua / Beringer Vineyards Napa CA Wedding

reviews.summary: Historic Rhine House is architectural gem. Beautiful gardens and grounds.

venues.name: Carneros Resort and Spa
venues.description: Luxury resort with 28 acres of rolling vineyards and gardens. Features multiple indoor and outdoor venues with stunning wine country views.

videos.title: Gabrielle & Jean's Wedding at Carneros Resort

reviews.summary: Luxury accommodations with wine country charm. Excellent spa services for wedding parties.

venues.name: Mountain House Estate
venues.description: 40 acres of rolling hills with Live Oak and Redwood trees. Exclusive use of entire venue, late hours until 2am. Owners praised for flexibility and personal touch.

videos.title: Mountain House Estate Wedding

reviews.summary: Venue so stunning minimal decor needed. Late hours (2am) are rare find. Flexible with vendors.

venues.name: Chateau St. Jean
venues.description: French Chateau-style winery with stunning gardens and Mediterranean architecture. Features elegant grounds perfect for outdoor ceremonies.

videos.title: Chateau St Jean Sonoma Wedding Video

reviews.summary: Elegant French-inspired setting with beautiful formal gardens.

venues.name: Garden Valley Ranch
venues.description: Charming rose farm with 8 acres of gardens. Budget-friendly option with intimate setting among thousands of rose bushes.

videos.title: Wedding Film | Garden Valley Ranch | Petaluma, CA

reviews.summary: Romantic rose garden setting. Great value for intimate weddings.

venues.name: Marin Art & Garden Center
venues.address: 30 Sir Francis Drake Blvd, Ross, CA 94957
venues.description: Beautiful garden venue in Marin County with multiple outdoor spaces including a stunning amphitheater and historic buildings.

videos.title: Erin and Billy McKechnie's Big Wedding Day | Marin Art & Garden Center | Ross, CA

reviews.summary: Beautiful gardens in convenient Marin location. Variety of ceremony spaces.

venues.name: Deer Park Villa
venues.description: Stunning redwood grove setting in the heart of Marin. Features outdoor ceremony space surrounded by majestic redwood trees.

videos.title: Deer Park Villa | California Wedding Video

reviews.summary: Magical redwood grove ceremony space. Large capacity for outdoor events.

venues.name: Filoli Historic House & Garden
venues.description: National Historic Landmark featuring 16 acres of English Renaissance gardens and a 54,000 sq ft Georgian Revival mansion. Nine event spaces available.

videos.title: A Magical Wedding at Filoli

reviews.summary: Stunning historic venue with meticulously curated gardens. Requires approved wedding planner. Premium pricing reflects exclusive experience.

venues.name: Kohl Mansion
venues.description: 1914 Tudor Revival mansion on the National Register of Historic Places. Features English rose garden, oak woodlands, and elegant Great Hall with grand staircase.

videos.title: Kohl Mansion Wedding Film

reviews.summary: Gorgeous historic mansion with exclusive use included. No corkage fees. Responsive professional staff.

venues.name: Thomas Fogarty Winery
venues.description: Perched 2,000 feet above Silicon Valley with panoramic bay views from San Francisco to San Jose. Floor-to-ceiling windows showcase stunning vineyard setting.

videos.title: Mountain Top Wedding at Thomas Fogarty

reviews.summary: Amazing panoramic views. 9-hour rental included. Can get chilly at night - recommend backup plan.

venues.name: The Mountain Terrace
venues.description: Redwood forest venue with large outdoor meadow, indoor bar and dance floor, terrace dining, and stunning bay views.

videos.title: A Wedding Above the Bay | The Mountain Terrace

reviews.summary: Stunning redwood setting. Excellent coordinators. Delicious food and service.

venues.name: The Ritz-Carlton Half Moon Bay
venues.address: 1 Miramontes Point Road, Half Moon Bay, CA 94019
venues.description: Dramatic luxury resort on ocean bluffs with sweeping Pacific views. Features elegant ballrooms and oceanfront lawn for ceremonies.

videos.title: Ritz Carlton Half Moon Bay Wedding

reviews.summary: Stunning oceanfront setting with top-notch Ritz-Carlton service. Very expensive. Some reports of inconsistent food quality.

venues.name: Rosewood Sand Hill
venues.address: 2825 Sand Hill Road, Menlo Park, CA 94025
venues.description: Forbes Five-Star luxury resort on 16 pristine acres with Santa Cruz Mountain views. Features glamorous ballroom and expansive outdoor lawns.

videos.title: Breathtaking Emotional California Wedding Video // Rosewood Sand Hill

reviews.summary: Five-star luxury experience with stunning grounds. Premium pricing.

venues.name: Domenico Winery
venues.description: Boutique urban winery with industrial-chic ambiance. Features white-washed brick walls, wine barrels, 20-foot ceilings, and 30-foot bar.

videos.title: Domenico Winery Wedding Tour

reviews.summary: Winery experience without driving to Napa/Sonoma. Industrial-chic vibe.

venues.name: Sam's Chowder House
venues.address: 4210 Cabrillo Highway North, Half Moon Bay, CA 94019
venues.description: Award-winning oceanfront restaurant on a cliff overlooking Pillar Point Harbor. Beach ceremonies available with beachfront lawn.

videos.title: Have an Oceanfront Wedding at Sam's Chowder House in Half Moon Bay

reviews.summary: Best waterfront dining in Bay Area. Beach ceremony option available.

venues.name: Nestldown
venues.address: 22420 Old Santa Cruz Hwy, Los Gatos, CA 95033
venues.description: 180-acre private estate in Santa Cruz Mountains with 36 acres of gardens surrounded by redwoods. Features ponds, waterfalls, koi pond, topiary serpents, and fairy cottage.

videos.title: Nestldown Wedding Film

reviews.summary: Magical gardens with whimsical touches like dragon sculpture and mini train. Exclusive use. Must use approved vendors.

venues.name: Villa Montalvo at Montalvo Arts Center
venues.description: 1912 Nationally Registered Historic Landmark featuring 150+ acres with Mediterranean-styled mansion and sweeping Santa Cruz Mountain views.

videos.title: Villa Montalvo Wedding

reviews.summary: Stunning historic mansion with Love Temple. Exclusive use. Premium pricing but worth it for the setting.

venues.name: Hakone Estate and Gardens
venues.description: The oldest and largest Japanese garden in the Western Hemisphere. Features 18 acres of tranquil gardens with koi pond, Moon Bridge, and bamboo garden.

videos.title: Hakone Gardens Wedding

reviews.summary: Unique Japanese garden setting. BYO alcohol permitted. Felt like destination wedding in Japan.

venues.name: The Mountain Winery
venues.description: Historic 600-acre Paul Masson property with 12 venue spaces offering breathtaking panoramic views of Silicon Valley from the Vista Deck.

videos.title: The Mountain Winery Wedding

reviews.summary: 12 venue spaces with stunning views. Responsive coordinator. No rain plan for Vista Deck.

venues.name: Saratoga Springs
venues.description: 5th-generation family venue in redwood forest featuring Cathedral Grove, Redwood Grove, Longbridge, and Creekside Room.

videos.title: Saratoga Springs Wedding | Sarah + Kevin | Highlight Film #saratogasprings

reviews.summary: Fairy-tale Long Bridge ceremony. Allows outside catering. Good value for redwood setting.

venues.name: Regale Winery and Vineyards
venues.description: Italian and French-inspired winery in Santa Cruz Mountains with Tuscan charm, vaulted ceilings, and lush gardens.

videos.title: Regale Winery and Vineyards - Wedding

reviews.summary: Intimate Tuscan-style winery. Tables, chairs, DJ, and audio included.

venues.name: Cinnabar Hills Golf Club
venues.description: Award-winning golf club voted Best Wedding Venue in Silicon Valley. Features landscaped outdoor patio and indoor reception with towering skylights.

videos.title: Cinnabar Hills Golf Club Wedding Venue Tour by AisleMemories

reviews.summary: Voted Best Wedding Venue in Silicon Valley. Rolling hills backdrop. In-house catering.

venues.name: Corinthian Grand Ballroom
venues.description: 1924 Scottish Rite Temple in Downtown San Jose with 50-foot ceilings, massive wooden beams, and blue glass panes with gold leaf grillwork.

videos.title: Corinthian Grand Ballroom Wedding Video | San Jose, CA

reviews.summary: Stunning historic architecture with dramatic 50-foot ceilings. Downtown San Jose location.

venues.name: Willow Heights Mansion
venues.address: 1978 Willow Springs Rd, Morgan Hill, CA 95037
venues.description: 16,000 sq ft private estate on 26 acres of rolling hills and vineyards. Features marble fireplaces, crystal chandeliers, and 360-degree terrace views.

videos.title: Willow Heights Mansion Wedding Video // Celine & Christian

reviews.summary: Stunning private estate with overnight accommodations. 360-degree views.

venues.name: Guglielmo Winery - Villa Emile
venues.address: 1480 E Main Ave, Morgan Hill, CA 95037
venues.description: Family-owned Italian winery since 1925 with 85 acres of vineyards. Features Villa Emile Event Center with green lawn, covered stage, and Heritage Room.

videos.title: California Weddings | Guglielmo Winery

reviews.summary: Old-world Italian charm. All-inclusive packages available.

venues.name: The Barns at Cooper Molera
venues.description: Historic venue from the 1860s in downtown Monterey with lush gardens of wildflowers, fruit trees, and roses. Combines rustic barn charm with garden settings.

videos.title: Victoria and Bradley's Wedding Video | The Barns at Cooper Molera | Monterey, CA

reviews.summary: Walking distance to downtown Monterey. Beautiful gardens with abundant photo ops.

venues.name: Monterey Plaza Hotel & Spa
venues.description: Luxury waterfront hotel on Cannery Row near Monterey Bay Aquarium. Features dramatic oceanfront ceremony spaces and elegant ballrooms.

videos.title: Weddings at the Monterey Plaza Hotel and Spa

reviews.summary: Stunning oceanfront location on Cannery Row. Award-winning California coastal cuisine.

venues.name: Monterey Bay Aquarium
venues.description: Unique venue allowing weddings among world-class marine exhibits including Open Sea Gallery, Kelp Forest, and Great Tide Pool.

videos.title: Djing a wedding at the Monterey bay aquarium

reviews.summary: Exchange vows in front of jellyfish, sharks, and sea turtles. Most spectacular venue imaginable.

venues.name: The Lodge at Pebble Beach
venues.description: Legendary resort on the famous 18th fairway overlooking Stillwater Cove. World-class accommodations with unmatched coastal golf course views.

videos.title: The Lodge at Pebble Beach Wedding Teaser

reviews.summary: Iconic 18th hole backdrop. World-famous setting with luxury accommodations.

venues.name: The Inn at Spanish Bay
venues.description: Contemporary luxury resort among majestic pines with over 14,000 sq ft of event space. Features bagpiper at sunset tradition.

videos.title: Inn at Spanish Bay Wedding Video (Pebble Beach, CA) - Sean Kenney Films

reviews.summary: Grand Ballroom with vaulted ceilings. Bagpiper at sunset tradition.

venues.name: Post Ranch Inn
venues.description: Ultra-luxury resort built into Big Sur cliffs overlooking Pacific. Ideal for microweddings and elopements.

videos.title: Post Ranch Inn Elopement Film

reviews.summary: Five-star service with breathtaking cliff views. Best for intimate weddings under 40 guests.

venues.name: Ventana Big Sur
venues.description: 160-acre rustic resort with Sur Vista terrace offering sweeping Pacific views. Features redwood forests, meadows, and multiple pools.

videos.title: Ventana Big Sur Wedding

reviews.summary: 5 ceremony sites including Redwood Cathedral and Ocean Meadow. Warmer than coastal areas.

venues.name: Dream Inn Santa Cruz
venues.address: 175 W Cliff Dr, Santa Cruz, CA 95060
venues.description: Iconic beachfront hotel with panoramic views of the Boardwalk, Wharf, and Monterey Bay. Features 3,500 sq ft Dream Ballroom with floor-to-ceiling windows.

videos.title: Dream Inn Santa Cruz Wedding

reviews.summary: Beachfront location with stunning bay views. Coordinator Katie praised as rockstar.

venues.name: Seascape Beach Resort
venues.description: Oceanfront resort with three distinct venues: The Bluff overlooking Monterey Bay, The Island with fountains and palm trees, and 17-mile private beach.

videos.title: Lindsey and Cory's Wedding Video | Seascape Beach Resort | Aptos, CA

reviews.summary: Three venue options with private beach access. On-site accommodations.

venues.name: Roaring Camp Railroads
venues.description: Historic railroad and logging camp in old-growth redwood forest. Unique steam train transports guests to Cathedral Grove ceremony site.

videos.title: Roaring Camp Wedding

reviews.summary: Unique steam train experience through redwoods. Old-growth forest setting. Free rehearsal day.

venues.name: Kennolyn Hilltop Hacienda
venues.description: Picturesque hilltop hideaway on 240 acres overlooking Monterey Bay. Spanish-style architecture with fountains, courtyards, and terraces.

videos.title: Kennolyn's Hilltop Hacienda Wedding

reviews.summary: All-inclusive packages reduce planning stress. Monterey Bay views from hilltop. No corkage fees.

venues.name: Chaminade Resort & Spa
venues.description: 300-acre woodland resort with Spanish heritage and Monterey Bay views. Features 156 guest rooms and Spanish-inspired courtyard with fountain.

videos.title: Isabelle and Josh's Wedding Video | Chaminade Resort & Spa | Santa Cruz, CA

reviews.summary: All-inclusive packages with complimentary wedding night stay. Spanish-inspired courtyard.

venues.name: Fern River Resort
venues.description: Family resort in redwoods along flowing river. Features custom redwood gazebo, manicured meadow, and 15 cabins for guest accommodations.

videos.title: Aubrey and Tom's Wedding Video | Fern River Resort | Felton, CA

reviews.summary: Budget-friendly redwood setting. 15 cabins for guest lodging. Four ceremony locations.

venues.name: Felton Guild
venues.description: Magical redwood grove with towering ancient trees creating natural cathedral. Outdoor venue with on-site Cowboy Bar & Grill catering.

videos.title: Jon + Alyssa | Felton Guild

reviews.summary: Affordable redwood cathedral setting. In business since 1994. On-site catering available.

venues.name: Holman Ranch
venues.description: 750-acre nationally recognized estate that hosted Charlie Chaplin gatherings since 1928. Features historic hacienda, award-winning wines, and exclusive property access.

videos.title: Holman Ranch Wedding Highlights

reviews.summary: Only one event at a time for exclusivity. Almost everything included. Staff makes couples feel like family.

venues.name: Folktale Winery & Vineyards
venues.description: French-style chateau with 15 acres of sustainably farmed vineyards. Features stunning Barrel Room with 500+ wine barrels and chandeliers.

videos.title: Folktale Winery Wedding

reviews.summary: Venue naturally decorates itself. Multiple indoor/outdoor spaces. 2026 discounts available.

venues.name: Mission Ranch
venues.description: Historic 22-acre ranch restored by Clint Eastwood. Spectacular views of Point Lobos, Carmel River Beach, and Pacific Ocean. Features resident sheep.

videos.title: Mission Ranch Wedding Film

reviews.summary: Best wedding food guests ever had. Dramatic bridge entrance for bride. Like traveling to Ireland.

venues.name: Carmel Valley Ranch
venues.description: 500+ acre luxury resort with vineyard, organic garden, 18-hole golf course, and Santa Lucia Mountain views. Vineyard Lawn nestled among Pinot Noir grapevines.

videos.title: Carmel Valley Ranch Wedding

reviews.summary: 5-star treatment throughout. Farm-to-table ingredients grown on property.

venues.name: Bernardus Lodge & Spa
venues.address: 415 West Carmel Valley Road, Carmel Valley, CA 93924
venues.description: 73-room boutique resort on 28 acres with 100+ rose varieties, 5 acres of lavender, and 8 acres of vineyards. Wedding garden with oak backdrop.

videos.title: Bernardus Lodge Wedding | Forever There For You | Olivia & Maxx

reviews.summary: Award-winning spa and restaurant. Beautiful rose gardens and lavender fields.

venues.name: Hyatt Carmel Highlands
venues.description: Historic 100-year-old resort perched on cliff overlooking Pacific and Big Sur coastline. Features open-air redwood deck ceremony space.

videos.title: Intimate Wedding at at the Carmel Hyatt Highlands overlooking the Big Sur Coast | Lyza & Pat

reviews.summary: Dramatic Pacific Ocean ceremony backdrop. 100+ years of wedding history.

venues.name: Stonepine Estate
venues.address: 150 East Carmel Valley Road, Carmel Valley, CA 93924
venues.description: 400+ acre Tuscan-style estate featuring 1929 Chateau Noel villa with ivy-covered walls. Includes private chapel, equestrian center, and formal gardens.

videos.title: "I'm so glad you guys chose each other" // Stonepine Estate Wedding Video

reviews.summary: Private chapel on property. Equestrian center with 5 miles of trails. Formal Tuscan gardens.

venues.name: La Playa Hotel
venues.address: Camino Real at 8th Avenue, Carmel-by-the-Sea, CA 93921
venues.description: Historic 1905 Spanish-style mansion two blocks from beach. Following $20 million renovation in 2023, features lush English gardens with 600+ flower varieties.

videos.title: Betsy and Connor's Wedding Video | La Playa Hotel | Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA

reviews.summary: Award-winning gardens after $20M renovation. Two blocks from Carmel beach.

venues.name: Quail Lodge & Golf Club
venues.description: Resort and golf club 10 minutes from downtown Carmel. Features Quail Meadows outdoor venue with rustic barn, lake, and 8,500+ sq ft of event space.

videos.title: Quail Lodge Resort wedding, Carmel wedding photographers | Kristen and Steve

reviews.summary: Multiple venue options including Glass House for intimate events. 18-hole championship golf.

venues.name: Carmel Fields by Wedgewood
venues.description: Spanish Colonial-style venue with coastal access. Offers garden ceremony or beach ceremonies at Monastery Beach. Most affordable option in Carmel area.

videos.title: Welcome to Carmel Fields by Wedgewood Weddings

reviews.summary: Most affordable Carmel option. All-inclusive packages with beach ceremony option.

venues.name: Four Seasons Resort Napa Valley
venues.description: Ultra-luxury resort with vineyard views, multiple event spaces, and world-class accommodations.

videos.title: Cinematic Four Seasons Napa Valley Wedding Teaser

venues.name: Solage, Auberge Resorts Collection
venues.description: Luxury spa resort with contemporary design, multiple indoor/outdoor venues, and award-winning dining.

videos.title: Tara and Dylan's Wedding Video | Solage, Auberge Resorts Collection | Calistoga, CA

venues.name: Auberge du Soleil
venues.description: Ultra-luxury hillside resort with Michelin-starred restaurant, olive groves, and panoramic valley views.

videos.title: Napa Valley Wedding at Auberge du Soleil

venues.name: Churchill Manor
venues.description: Historic Victorian B&B with beautiful gardens, wrap-around veranda, and romantic charm.

videos.title: Adrienne and Nicholas | Churchill Manor

venues.name: CIA at Greystone
venues.description: Culinary Institute of America's historic stone building with stunning architecture and exceptional catering.

videos.title: ALEXA + BRANDON WEDDING FILM | THE CIA AT GREYSTONE, ST. HELENA, CALIFORNIA | A7SIII

venues.name: Gundlach Bundschu Winery
venues.description: California's oldest family-owned winery (since 1858) with stunning vineyard views and historic charm.

videos.title: Colorful Cowboy wedding at Gundlach Bundschu Winery | Sonoma, CA | Tessa & Maynard

videos.title: Maritza & Alex / Vintners Resort Wedding Santa Rosa

venues.name: Gardener Ranch
venues.address: 114 W Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924
venues.description: 24-acre property alongside Carmel River with five ceremony sites and overnight lodging.

venues.name: Tehama Golf Club
venues.description: Clint Eastwood's private community with 18,000 sq ft Spanish-style clubhouse.

venues.name: Galante Vineyards
venues.description: 700-acre historic cattle ranch and premium Cabernet Sauvignon vineyard.

videos.title: Kozlowski - Galante Wedding at FairWinds Farm

venues.name: Vila Vita Parc Resort & Spa
venues.description: Five-star luxury resort set in 22 hectares of lush sub-tropical gardens overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. Features a 2-Michelin star restaurant Ocean, wine cellar, and chapel with stunning sea views. Offers cliff-top terraces, intimate gardens, and secluded white sandy beach. Member of The Leading Hotels of the World.

videos.title: Vila Vita Parc Resort & Spa - 4K video tour of one of Portugal's most exclusive resorts

venues.name: Tivoli Carvoeiro Algarve Resort
venues.description: Five-star crescent-shaped resort perched on Vale Covo cliffside with panoramic Atlantic Ocean views. Features cliff-top ceremony locations, garden settings, and 248 rooms including luxury suites. Stunning backdrop of the quaint fishing village of Carvoeiro.

videos.title: Joanna and Nathan - Tivoli Carvoeiro

venues.name: Pousada Palacio Estoi
venues.address: Rua Sao Jose, Estoi, 8005-465 Faro, Portugal
venues.description: Luxurious 18th-century palace blending Neoclassical, Neo-Rococo, and Art Nouveau styles. The only palace hotel in the Algarve and member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Features lush French-style gardens, So Jose chapel, stunning sea and mountain views, and 63 beautifully designed rooms.

videos.title: Amazing Estoi Palace Wedding

venues.name: QO - Quinta das Oliveiras
venues.description: Large country estate in Western Algarve offering an eclectic mix of Portuguese elegance and old school glamour. White-washed villa with Mediterranean-styled outdoor spaces, nestled in secluded hills overlooking Lagos historic centre and Atlantic Ocean. Just 2 minutes from Meia Praia beach.

videos.title: Tux Produes - Casamento Quinta das Oliveiras - 05 - 10 - 2019

venues.name: Pine Cliffs Resort
venues.address: Praia da Falesia, PO Box 644, 8200-909 Albufeira, Portugal
venues.description: Sprawling 72-hectare luxury resort bordered by aromatic pine woods and dramatic orange sandstone cliffs. Features 13 adaptable event rooms, cliff-top Mirador venue with Atlantic views, Tabu Garden surrounded by pine trees, and award-winning Serenity Spa. Part of The Luxury Collection.

videos.title: Wedding Editorial at Pine Cliffs Resort

venues.name: Conrad Algarve
venues.address: Estrada da Quinta do Lago, 8135-106 Quinta do Lago, Portugal
venues.description: Stylish luxury hotel in the prestigious Quinta do Lago resort, near the Ria Formosa Nature Park and Atlantic coastline. Features beautiful suites, Infinity Penthouse, Michelin star dining, and signature spa experiences. Sophisticated setting for elegant weddings.

videos.title: Will and Natasha: Unforgettable Wedding at Conrad Algarve and Parrilla Natural - Quinta do Lago

venues.name: Morgado do Quintao
venues.address: Between Silves and Lagoa, Algarve, Portugal
venues.description: Historic family-owned vineyard estate dating from the early 1800s, nestled between Monchique mountains and Atlantic. Features century-old vines, a 2,000-year-old olive tree, old olive mill, rustic stone buildings, and breathtaking Algarve landscape views. Perfect for rustic vineyard weddings.

videos.title: Morgado do Quinto - Amazing Wedding Venue in Algarve

venues.name: Os Agostos
venues.address: Sitio dos Agostos CP 195A, Santa Barbara de Nexe, 8005-401, Portugal
venues.description: 18th-century estate filled with character on 3 hectares of farmland. Comprises two dwelling units and an olive press house, offering unique spaces for stylish bohemian weddings. Located between coastline and highlands, just 14 km from Faro city.

videos.title: The MAD Kitchen | Wedding Maisie & Matt | Os Agostos

venues.name: Quinta dos Vales
venues.description: Remarkable 44-hectare wine estate in Western Algarve combining award-winning wines with stunning sculptures in beautiful gardens. Features Panoramic Terrace with vineyard views seating up to 120, villa accommodations for 100 guests, and art centre. Just 15 minutes from the beach.

videos.title: Peter & Elena | Wedding in the Algarve | Quinta dos Vales Wine Estate

venues.name: Farmhouse of the Palms
venues.address: Cerro Do Botelho, 8150-027 Sao Bras de Alportel, Portugal
venues.description: 200-year-old Portuguese monte (farmhouse) where traditional charm meets contemporary comfort. Quiet whitewashed hideaway tucked into the hills, featuring 5 private suites with private terraces. Perfect for intimate weddings, micro-weddings, and elopements.

videos.title: Take a look at The Farmhouse Events

venues.name: Quinta do Torneiro
venues.address: Estrada Quinta do Torneiro, 2770-144 Paco de Arcos, Portugal
venues.description: 18th-century rural summer holiday manor house with stunning 250-year-old hand-painted azulejos covering walls of main rooms. Features three beautiful gardens, covered terrace with marquee, high artistically crafted ceilings, and 6 rooms for overnight guests. Just 15 minutes from downtown Lisbon.

videos.title: Jeverly & Felix | Wedding Film | Quinta do Torneiro - Portugal

venues.name: Quinta da Bichinha
venues.address: Estrada de Vila Cha, 2580-413 Alenquer, Portugal
venues.description: Centuries-old wine estate converted into wedding venue, surrounded by scented olive groves and vineyards. Ancient wine cellars transformed in 2003 into cozy unique space. Features 31 rooms plus two wedding suites, lake area, and both indoor and outdoor ceremony options.

videos.title: Quinta da Bichinha - Epic Wedding, Party of the century / 2022

venues.name: Quinta de Sao Goncalo
venues.description: Centuries-old wine estate rehabilitated as a wedding venue near Lisbon. Ancient cellars transformed in 2008 into cozy unique space, encircled by carefully manicured gardens and extensive vineyards. Features charming lake for photographic sessions, children's playground, and alfresco aperitif area.

videos.title: French Destination Wedding in Portugal, Quinta de So Gonalo / 2019

venues.name: Pestana Palace Lisboa
venues.description: Restored 19th-century palace and 5-star hotel, member of The Leading Hotels of the World. Features lush gardens with plants designated as National Monuments, breathtaking city views, indoor and outdoor pools, spa, and elegant ballrooms with natural light. Close to Tower of Belem and Jeronimos Monastery.

videos.title: Pestana Palace Wedding in Lisbon, Portugal

venues.name: Quinta de Sant'Ana
venues.description: Historic vineyard estate dating back to 1633, bordering Tapada de Mafra national park. Features 12 hectares of rolling vineyards, beautiful houses accommodating 52 guests. Nearly 1,000 weddings hosted. Just 30-minute drive from Lisbon.

videos.title: Vineyard Wedding at Quinta de Sant'Ana, Portugal

venues.name: Tivoli Palacio de Seteais
venues.address: Rua Barbosa du Bocage 8, 2710-517 Sintra, Portugal
venues.description: 18th-century neoclassical palace hotel with spectacular views of Moorish Castle and Pena Palace. Features luxurious rooms decorated with amazing frescoes, lush gardens with camellias and lemon trees, and typical palace mazes. Now a five-star hotel offering exclusive buyouts.

videos.title: G + S // Wedding in Sintra, Portugal  Hotel Tivoli Palacio De Setais

venues.name: Quinta da Bella Vista
venues.address: Rua Barbosa du Bocage 60, 2710-517 Sintra, Portugal
venues.description: Historic estate formerly owned by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, father of Sherlock Holmes. Spans four hectares with exquisite gardens, featuring grand Palacio, Villa Camelia, Villa Monserrate, Casa Bohemia, Victorian Greenhouse, garden theater, and two swimming pools. 16 bedroom suites accommodating 36 guests.

videos.title: Quinta Bella Vista Wedding in Sintra, Portugal

venues.name: Monserrate Palace
venues.description: 19th-century palace featuring exotic blend of Gothic, Moorish, and Indian architecture. A protected state monument in Sintra's Natural Preserved Park with extensive romantic gardens. Music Room provides excellent acoustics for ceremonies, and the romantic ruins offer intimate ceremony spots.

videos.title: Monserrate Wedding Sintra Wild Romantic

venues.name: Penha Longa Resort (The Ritz-Carlton)
venues.address: Estrada da Lagoa Azul, 2714-511 Sintra, Portugal
venues.description: 14th-century monastery turned luxury Ritz-Carlton resort. Features 16th-century chapel, Sala dos Arcos (former stables), and beautiful gardens across 25+ event spaces. Sala Coroa is the largest venue for grand celebrations. Historical event rooms and private church create unforgettable settings.

videos.title: A Royal Indian Wedding at Ritz-Carlton Penha Longa|Luxury Destination Celebration in Sintra,Portugal

venues.name: Casa dos Penedos
venues.description: Historical pink villa built in 1922 by renowned Portuguese architect Raul Lino. Located on breathtaking Sintra hills with magnificent views of Palacio de Sintra, local village, and Atlantic Ocean. Features classic Antigo Salao de Breille room and romantic garden settings.

videos.title: Casa dos Penedos Wedding in Sintra, Portugal

venues.name: Six Senses Douro Valley
venues.address: Quinta de Vale Abraao, Samodaes, 5100-758 Lamego, Portugal
venues.description: Luxury wellness resort set in a beautifully restored 19th-century manor house overlooking the Douro River and UNESCO World Heritage vineyards. Features stunning terraced gardens, wine cellar, organic restaurant, and world-class spa. Perfect for destination weddings combining wine, wellness, and romance.

videos.title: Wedding Film at Six Senses Douro Valley - Jean & Charlie | A Magical Celebration

venues.name: The Yeatman Hotel
venues.address: Rua do Choupelo, Santa Marinha, 4400-088 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
venues.description: Luxury wine hotel in the historic heart of Vila Nova de Gaia with unrivalled views over the Douro and Porto. Features 109 bedrooms including ultra-luxurious suites, 2-Michelin star restaurant, wine spa, indoor and outdoor infinity pools. 13 event rooms with audiovisual technology.

videos.title: Wedding at The Yeatman Hotel - Porto

venues.name: Pestana Palacio do Freixo
venues.description: National Monument classified since 1910, masterpiece of Baroque architecture by Nicolau Nasoni. Features 108,000 sq ft of gardens with breathtaking Douro River views. Multiple banquet halls including D. Jeronimo room, restaurant, and exterior garden with marquees. Just 10 minutes from Porto city centre.

videos.title: Romantic Wedding in Porto | Palcio do Freixo - Rita e Valter

venues.name: Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo
venues.address: Quinta Nova, Covas do Douro, 5085-222 Pinhao, Portugal
venues.description: Historic estate with over 200 years of history, listed since first Douro wine region demarcation in 1756. Once owned by Portuguese Royal family. First wine-dedicated hotel in Portugal with 11 rooms, part of Relais & Chateaux network. Features 120 hectares of vineyards overlooking Douro River.

videos.title: La "Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora de Carmo" - PRSENTATION OFFICIELLE

venues.name: Quinta do Vallado
venues.address: Avenida Jose Vasques Osorio, 5050 Peso da Regua, Vila Real, Portugal
venues.description: Founded in 1716, one of oldest and most respected wineries in Douro Valley with over 300 years of family ownership. Features 70+ hectares of vineyards, award-winning wines, and Wine Hotel with 19 guest rooms in Traditional House, Modern Building, and Eira Suites. Standout wine cellar perfect for intimate dinners.

videos.title: Wedding Video // Douro // Quinta do Mosteir // Gilberto&Ftima

venues.name: Casa da Calcada Relais & Chateaux
venues.description: Historic 16th-century palace turned luxury boutique hotel in romantic Amarante, part of Relais & Chateaux. Features elegant period architecture, gourmet restaurant, and spa. Located on the banks of Tamega River with stunning views of Sao Goncalo Monastery. About 61 km from Porto.

videos.title: Casamentos / Weddings at Casa da Calada Relais & Chateaux

venues.name: Quinta do Crasto
venues.description: 135-hectare estate on the right bank of Douro River between Regua and Pinhao, with records dating to 1615. Features 74 hectares of vineyards, four luxury suites, infinity pool protruding from dramatic hillside, and wine/tapas service. Offers guided tours, wine tastings, and boat trips on Douro River.

videos.title: Quinta do Alferes de Crasto Wedding - Bruno Garcez

venues.name: Sao Lourenco do Barrocal
venues.description: Sprawling 780-hectare organic-certified family estate owned for over 200 years, designed by Pritzker Prize-winning architect Souto Moura (Golden Lion at Venice Biennale). Former farming village restored into understated luxury hotel with 40 rooms and cottages, winery, farm-to-table restaurants, spa by Susanne Kaufmann.

videos.title: So Loureno do Barrocal

venues.name: L'AND Vineyards
venues.address: Herdade das Valadas, Estrada Nacional 4, 7050-031 Montemor-o-Novo, Portugal
venues.description: Exclusive retreat designed by Promontorio and Marcio Kogan, featuring 43 state-of-the-art suites and villas with opening ceilings to sleep under stars. Part of Relais & Chateaux network with exclusive art collection. South-facing valley overlooking medieval Montemor Castle. Hotel privatization required for weddings.

videos.title: Lorena & Pedro | Wedding in Portugal  Land Vineyards

venues.name: Herdade do Freixo
venues.description: Award-winning winery named Building of the Year 2018 by ArchDaily NY, featuring stark brutalist architecture set against rolling vineyards. Unique space designed for producing super premium wines while offering unparalleled setting for events. Located in small village between Serra D'Ossa and Evora.

videos.title: Pousada do Freixo - Harmonizao a copo

venues.name: Torre de Palma Wine Hotel
venues.address: Herdade de Torre de Palma, 7450-250 Monforte, Portugal
venues.description: 5-star design hotel built atop remains of a 1338 villa in hilltop village. Features 14th-century architecture, 7-hectare vineyard, artisan winery, cozy barrel room, and wine-tasting cellar. Surrounded by horse-grazed pastures, olive groves, and citrus-scented village of Monforte. Part of Design Hotels and Marriott Bonvoy.

videos.title: Margaret and Hajir's Wedding Celebration | Torre de Palma Wine Hotel, Portugal | April 2025

venues.name: Convento do Espinheiro
venues.description: Former 15th-century convent meticulously restored as five-star hotel preserving majestic architecture and frescoes. Features Santa Maria do Espinheiro Church (1200m2) for ceremonies, Manueline cloisters for civil ceremonies, lush gardens, elegant ballroom, and 90 beautifully appointed rooms. Just over an hour from Lisbon.

videos.title: Ana e Joo wedding in vora - Convento do Espinheiro - 30 setembro 2023

venues.name: Herdade dos Grous
venues.address: Herdade dos Grous, Albernoa, 7800-601 Beja, Portugal
venues.description: 1100-hectare wine and agrotourism estate in heart of Alentejo countryside, established in 2004. Features charming bandstand overlooking lake, infinity pool, secluded lawn, and 24 immaculate rooms. Located near Beja, just 170 km from Lisbon. Perfect romantic escape for intimate celebrations.

videos.title: Herdade dos Grous

venues.name: Pena Palace
venues.description: THE most famous castle in Portugal, built in 1836 with bright yellow and red towers perched high above the clouds. Features Romanesque, vintage, and romantic architecture with grand terraces and gardens. Weddings are limited and require special arrangements, offering truly one-of-a-kind experience.

videos.title: Wedding at Monserrate Palace and Pena Palace Sintra  ~ by Lisbon Wedding Planner

venues.name: Quinta da Conceicao
venues.address: Torres Vedras area, Lisbon Region, Portugal
venues.description: Hidden gem set in private rural estate featuring fully restored 1715 baroque manor house. Dream wedding and retreat venue sleeping up to 33 guests with grand living spaces, glorious gardens, and magnificent swimming pool. Genuine historic country retreat.

videos.title: Quinta da Conceio Historic Country Retreat - Portugal Wedding Video

venues.name: The Quinta (My Vintage Wedding Portugal)
venues.address: Sintra, UNESCO World Heritage Site, Portugal
venues.description: First wedding venue with rustic vintage style in Portugal, boasting more than 200 years of history. Located in Sintra, one of the most beautiful villages in the world claimed by UNESCO as World Heritage. Features stunning views, beautiful gardens, and authentic vintage charm.

videos.title: The Quinta - My Vintage Wedding

venues.name: Quinta da Regaleira
venues.address: Rua Barbosa du Bocage 5, 2710-567 Sintra, Portugal
venues.description: UNESCO World Heritage site featuring romantic palace and chapel with Gothic, Renaissance, and Manueline architectural elements. Famous for its mysterious initiation well, grottos, and elaborate gardens. Walking hand-in-hand through the grounds creates a unique wedding experience.

videos.title: Planning our wedding in Portugal (seeing the venue for the 1st time) | PORTUGAL TRAVEL VLOG #2

venues.name: Sintra National Palace (Palacio da Vila)
venues.address: Largo Rainha Dona Amelia, 2710-616 Sintra, Portugal
venues.description: Distinguished Moorish and Manueline-style palace with dramatic twin chimneys and elaborate Portuguese azulejos tiles. Best-preserved medieval royal residence in Portugal with continuous royal occupation from 15th to late 19th century. Central Sintra location with rich history.

videos.title: Sintra Palace Wedding

venues.name: Quinta do Lago
venues.description: Prestigious luxury resort community in the Golden Triangle of Algarve, bordering Ria Formosa Natural Park. Features world-class golf courses, private beach, lakeside restaurants, and luxury villas. Offers various venue options for elegant destination weddings in exclusive setting.

videos.title: Casa do Lago Wedding || Quinta do Lago || Portugal

venues.name: Casa de Reguengos (Venues in Portugal)
venues.description: Charming countryside quinta about 30 minutes from Lisbon, part of the Venues in Portugal collection. Shares philosophy of quality service and art of hospitality with unique and exclusive spaces. Perfect for intimate weddings seeking traditional Portuguese countryside charm.

videos.title: French destination wedding video in Casa de Reguengos, Portugal / 2017

venues.name: Castelo Ventoso
venues.description: Family-run estate in the heart of Alentejo offering idyllic setting for intimate celebrations. Features traditional Alentejo architecture and countryside setting with authentic Portuguese hospitality. Perfect for couples seeking peaceful, rural wedding experience.

videos.title: Castello di Viano - DJI MAVIC MINI [sunset shooting]

venues.name: Quinta do Casal Novo (Venues in Portugal)
venues.description: Traditional Portuguese quinta in Greater Lisbon region, part of Venues in Portugal collection. Features quality service and unique exclusive spaces about 30 minutes from Lisbon. Offers authentic countryside wedding experience with professional coordination.

videos.title: Weddings in Portugal - Quinta do Casal Novo

venues.name: Sesmarias Turismo Rural & Spa
venues.address: Alentejo, Portugal (just over an hour from Lisbon)
venues.description: Magnificent property in Alentejo for weddings and events. Features 16 luxurious rooms for accommodation, spa facilities, and beautiful grounds. Ideal for intimate celebrations between 30 and 100 guests seeking rural Portuguese luxury.

videos.title: Monte da Estrela, Country House and Spa

venues.name: Quinta do Muro
venues.description: One of Algarve's most unique and design-forward wedding venues, tucked away in hills above Loule. Features clean architectural lines blended with Mediterranean nature, surrounded by olive groves and dry gardens. Peaceful, modern setting for intimate destination weddings.

videos.title: WEDDING VENUES IN PORTUGAL - EPISODE 1 - QUINTA DO MURO

venues.name: Quinta de Lemos
venues.description: Wine estate in the beautiful valley of Dao, Portugal's oldest wine producing region. Features 25 hectares of vineyards surrounded by olive trees, orchards, and woods at 340m altitude. Home to Mesa de Lemos restaurant offering gastronomic voyage with mountain and vineyard views.

videos.title: Os Deolinda na Quinta de Lemos

venues.name: Villa Cimbrone
venues.description: A 12th-century palace with world-famous gardens spanning 6 hectares (14.8 acres), featuring the iconic Terrace of Infinity (Terrazza dell'Infinito) with stunning Mediterranean views. This 5-star boutique hotel offers 19 beautiful guestrooms and is renowned for its romantic belvedere and historic architecture.

videos.title: Introducing Villa Cimbrone, a Luxury Wedding Venue in Ravello Italy l Paulina Yeh Events

venues.name: Belmond Hotel Caruso
venues.address: Piazza San Giovanni del Toro, 2, 84010 Ravello (SA), Italy
venues.description: An 11th-century palace transformed into a luxury hotel, perched 365 meters above sea level with panoramic Mediterranean views. Features an iconic infinity pool that appears to merge with the sky and sea, lush terraced gardens, and 50 guest rooms including 8 suites.

videos.title: Belmond Hotel Caruso wedding film From the moment we met

venues.name: Palazzo Avino
venues.address: Via San Giovanni del Toro, 28, 84010 Ravello, Italy
venues.description: A stunning five-star luxury hotel originally built as a 12th-century private villa for Italian nobility. Features 43 rooms and suites, a Michelin-starred restaurant (Rossellinis), a spa and beauty center, outdoor heated pool, and panoramic terraces overlooking the Amalfi Coast fishing villages 350 meters above the Mediterranean.

videos.title: Palazzo Avino luxury wedding

venues.name: Villa Treville
venues.description: Once the private retreat of legendary Italian director Franco Zeffirelli, this cliffside luxury venue spreads across four stunning villas surrounded by lush gardens, hidden terraces, and ancient tropical plants. Features 15 rooms and suites with private balconies, the renowned Rotunda for ceremonies, a beach club, and breathtaking Tyrrhenian Sea views.

videos.title: Villa Treville wedding in Positano. Wedding elopement video.

venues.name: Le Sirenuse
venues.description: An epitome of Italian elegance with 58 uniquely designed rooms reflecting the radiant shimmer of the Mediterranean. This family-owned luxury hotel offers traditional Amalfi architecture enveloped in pristine white ambiance, with iconic views of Positano's colorful cliffs and the Mediterranean Sea.

venues.name: Il San Pietro di Positano
venues.description: A 5-star hotel featuring private beach access, Michelin-starred restaurant, fitness center, tennis courts, spa, and outdoor pool. One of the only hotels on the Amalfi Coast with direct access to the Tyrrhenian Sea, offering elegantly furnished rooms and terraces overlooking the ocean.

venues.name: Monastero Santa Rosa
venues.address: Via Roma, 2, 84010 Conca dei Marini (SA), Italy
venues.description: A magnificent 17th-century monastery transformed into a 5-star luxury hotel, dramatically perched on the edge of a sheer cliff above the Bay of Salerno. Features 20 luxury rooms and suites, a small chapel in the garden, and breathtaking terraces overlooking the Gulf of Salerno perfect for intimate ceremonies and receptions.

venues.name: Villa Astor
venues.description: A majestic villa perched on the cliffs of Sorrento with breathtaking views of the Bay of Naples and Mount Vesuvius. Features 4 suites and 2 luxurious bedrooms designed by renowned interior decorator Jacques Garcia, a Grand Salon, wide panoramic terrace, and extensive gardens perfect for outdoor celebrations.

venues.name: Villa del Balbianello
venues.description: One of the most iconic villas on Lake Como, built in 1787 on a promontory tip. Famous for hosting scenes from Star Wars and James Bond - Casino Royale. Features stunning lakeside terraces, the beautiful Loggia, and terraced gardens with unparalleled views. Access is only by boat, adding to its exclusivity.

venues.name: Villa Pizzo
venues.description: A 17th-century villa with the largest private garden (12 hectares) on Lake Como, meaning no music curfew. Features gorgeous frescoes, Italian gardens, and a court for outdoor dining. Famously hosted the wedding of John Legend and Chrissy Teigen.

venues.name: Grand Hotel Tremezzo
venues.description: A 1910 Art Nouveau palace and five-star hotel perfectly positioned on Lake Como. Surrounded by two acres of manicured private gardens, featuring 90 rooms and luxury suites, two swimming pools (including one floating on the lake), a private beach, spa, and tennis courts.

venues.name: Villa d'Este
venues.description: Built in 1568 as the summer residence of Cardinal Tolomeo Gallio, transformed into a luxury hotel in 1873. Offers 152 rooms plus four private villas, 25 acres of magnificent gardens with statues and landscapes, multiple ceremony locations including Terrace Mantero and the famous Mosaic Garden.

venues.name: Villa Sola Cabiati
venues.description: A breathtaking 16th-century residence in the elegant town of Tremezzo, known as 'The Pearl of the Lake'. Features 6 luxurious suites accommodating 12 guests, ornately designed interior halls, panoramic terraces, and Italian gardens overlooking Lake Como.

venues.name: Castello di Vicarello
venues.address: Localit Vicarello, 58044 Poggi del Sasso, Cinigiano (GR), Italy
venues.description: A 12th-century castle transformed into a refined yet relaxed hideaway where medieval architecture meets effortless design. The castle is entirely yours for weddings: every key, every view, every hidden corner. Set amid rolling Tuscan hills with luminous interiors and complete seclusion.

venues.name: Castello di Casole
venues.description: A Belmond property and 10th-century castle regally perched on a hilltop, immersed in 4,200 acres of rolling hills and lush forest. Features 39 rooms, an ancient amphitheatre, Tosca Terrace, Chiesa S. Tommaso Chapel, and Limonaia Terrace for various celebration sizes.

venues.name: Il Borro
venues.address: Localit Il Borro, 1, 52024 San Giustino Valdarno (AR), Italy
venues.description: A 1,000-year-old fortified medieval village restored by the Ferragamo family, part of Relais & Chateaux. The 1,100-hectare estate features vineyards, olive groves, cypress-lined hills, 58 suites and private villas, Michelin-starred dining, heated panoramic pool, and Il Borro Spa by COMO Shambhala.

venues.name: Borgo Santo Pietro
venues.description: A lovingly restored 13th-century villa and hamlet nestled in a 300-acre organic estate of woods, vineyards, herb gardens, and a private river. This Relais & Chateaux flagship features 22 rooms and suites, Michelin-star cuisine, world-class spa, and romantic gardens lined with fountains.

venues.name: Rosewood Castiglion del Bosco
venues.address: Localit Castiglion del Bosco, 53024 Montalcino (SI), Italy
venues.description: An exclusive resort in the heart of the Val d'Orcia, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Features over two dozen ceremony venues including castle ruins, scenic gardens, private villas, and the medieval church of San Michele Arcangelo. Offers 42 spacious suites and 11 luxury farmhouse villas.

venues.name: Villa Cetinale
venues.description: A 17th-century Baroque architectural masterpiece featuring formal Italian gardens, ancient woodland park, and refined interiors. Often called 'the most beautiful villa in Tuscany', it offers 13 bedrooms and exclusive use for weddings and events.

venues.name: Villa Cora
venues.description: A 19th-century mansion just outside Florence's historic center, balancing classic architecture with eclectic interiors and vibrant personality. Features mirrored walls, frescoes, chandeliers, a poolside garden, and panoramic views of Florence's hills and historic center.

venues.name: Villa Vignamaggio
venues.address: Via Petriolo, 5, 50022 Greve in Chianti (FI), Italy
venues.description: A 15th-century Renaissance villa built by the Gherardini family, set on a 400-hectare wine estate in the heart of Chianti. Features 17 suites, a 144-seat theater, charming chapel with original frescos, ballroom, and dancing room. Civil ceremonies can be celebrated on-site through agreement with the Town Hall.

venues.name: Palazzo Pisani Moretta
venues.description: An authentic 15th-century Venetian Palace situated along the Grand Canal, between Rialto Bridge and Ca'Foscari. Features spacious Baroque halls decorated by outstanding 18th-century Venetian artists across ground, first, and second floors. Accessible by water taxi or gondola for ultimate Venetian romance.

venues.name: Aman Venice
venues.description: Hidden within the 16th-century Palazzo Papadopoli on the Grand Canal, where centuries-old frescoes blend with Aman's signature understated luxury. Features towering gilded ceilings, glass chandeliers, and a serene garden. Famously hosted George Clooney and Amal Alamuddin's wedding.

venues.name: Belmond Hotel Cipriani
venues.description: Located on Giudecca island, overlooking Venice's most outstanding landmarks including the Doge's Palace and St Mark's Square. Known for interiors decorated with delicate artefacts, the most fabulous swimming pool in Venice, and gardens with panoramic lagoon views.

venues.name: San Clemente Palace Kempinski
venues.address: Isola di San Clemente, 1, 30124 Venezia (VE), Italy
venues.description: Located on its own private island in the Venetian lagoon, just 10 minutes from St. Mark's Square by boat. This 900-year-old landmark features restored monastery buildings, a 12th-century chapel, nearly 20 acres of ancient gardens, courtyards, and terraces with breathtaking city views. Winner of Best Wedding Hotel by World Travel Awards.

venues.name: Ca' Sagredo Hotel
venues.description: A historic palace with stunning frescos, opulent decor, and breathtaking Grand Canal views. Features elegant rooms and suites in a building that preserves precious works of art, making it perfect for a grand Venetian wedding.

venues.name: The Gritti Palace
venues.address: Campo Santa Maria del Giglio, 2467, 30124 Venezia (VE), Italy
venues.description: Dating back to 1475, this historic palazzo on the Grand Canal became the residence of the Doge of Venice in 1525. Part of Marriott's Luxury Collection, featuring seven event rooms including the spectacular 250-square meter Redentore Terrace Suite rooftop with unequaled views of Venice.

venues.name: Hotel Excelsior Venice Lido
venues.address: Lungomare Marconi, 41, 30126 Lido di Venezia (VE), Italy
venues.description: A fabulous Venetian Renaissance palace on the Lido island, featuring 10 versatile event spaces, 198 guest rooms, and multiple venue options. The only hotel in Venice licensed for firework displays. Features the magnificent Sala Stucchi ballroom with Murano glass chandeliers and sea views.

venues.name: Castello Odescalchi
venues.description: One of the most beautiful feudal castles in Europe, built in 1470, dominating Lake Bracciano. Located about 40 minutes from Rome, this magnificent castle has hosted weddings for Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes, Tyron Power, and Martin Scorsese. Features elegant rooms, enchanted gardens, and accommodates both intimate ceremonies and grand events.

venues.name: Villa Aurelia
venues.address: Largo di Porta S. Pancrazio, 2, 00152 Roma (RM), Italy
venues.description: A superb 17th-century masterpiece perched atop Janiculum Hill, property of the American Academy in Rome since 1909. Embodies classic Italian 'dolce vita' with perfectly manicured gardens, refined rooms with impressive chandeliers, and panoramic views of Rome's historic center. Rented exclusively for one event per day.

venues.name: Villa Miani
venues.description: Built in the late 19th century atop Monte Mario, offering the widest and most exclusive panoramic view of Rome, close to St. Peter's dome. Features a huge park with Italian gardens, neoclassical facades, terraces, courtyards, and over 3,000 square meters of rooms with frescoes and precious marbles.

venues.name: Grand Hotel Timeo
venues.description: The first hotel built in Taormina in 1873, part of the Belmond collection. Set steps from the magnificent Greek Theatre in a six-acre tropical garden with olives, lemon trees, cypresses, magnolias, and wisteria-laden pergolas. Features stunning views of Mount Etna and Michelin-starred cuisine.

venues.name: Villa Igiea
venues.description: A prestigious Rocco Forte hotel situated in Palermo, overlooking the azure waters of the Tyrrhenian Sea. This historic Art Nouveau villa embodies glamor, elegance, and Sicilian charm, featuring the magnificent Belle Epoque Ballroom and luxurious accommodations for unforgettable celebrations.

venues.name: Tonnara di Scopello
venues.description: An ancient fishing village transformed into a unique wedding venue, nestled in its own private bay on the picturesque Sicilian coast. Features 15 apartments sleeping up to 55 guests, stunning sea views, rustic courtyards, and lovingly restored stone buildings for an authentic Italian experience.

venues.name: Masseria Potenti
venues.description: A 16th-century masseria nestled in the countryside near the Ionian Sea, featuring its own vineyards, kitchen garden, and olive groves with farm-to-table cuisine. Offers 19 rooms sleeping up to 55 guests, with no music curfew allowing parties until early hours. Fireworks are permitted.

venues.name: Masseria Torre Coccaro
venues.address: Contrada Coccaro, 8, 72015 Savelletri di Fasano (BR), Italy
venues.description: A 16th-century farmhouse with a striking tower, a stone's throw from the beach, surrounded by centenarian olive, almond, and carob trees. This 5-star family-run boutique hotel offers 43 spacious rooms including 2 suites with private pools, a 400 sq.m. crystal gazebo for 200 guests, and exclusive use options.

venues.name: Masseria San Domenico
venues.description: A historic 15th-century structure with an imposing watchtower that once belonged to the Knights of Malta. This exclusive 5-star hotel is set in 60 hectares of Mediterranean gardens surrounded by centuries-old olive trees, just 500 meters from the Adriatic coast. Features 40 luxury rooms, two pools, spa, and Thalassotherapy centre.

venues.name: Borgo Egnazia
venues.address: Strada Provinciale 90, Loc. Egnazia, 72015 Savelletri di Fasano (BR), Italy
venues.description: A 5-star luxury resort developed over 4,000 square meters, featuring traditional Puglian architecture surrounded by olive groves and rolling hills. Offers 63 bedrooms in the main hotel, 28 villas with private pools, and 92 traditional Puglian houses, with multiple event spaces including village squares and poolside areas.

venues.name: Masseria Le Carrube
venues.description: A charming masseria at the foot of Ostuni hill, showcasing the region's iconic trulli houses and traditional stone architecture. Features 19 rustic suites, two swimming pools (one heated), an ancient oil mill with millstones, and a zero-waste vegetarian restaurant using produce from the masseria's gardens.

venues.name: Villa La Rondinaia
venues.description: A captivating villa seamlessly blending historic charm with breathtaking Mediterranean views, ideal for fairytale weddings on the Amalfi Coast. This enchanting venue offers stunning panoramic terraces overlooking the sea and lush private grounds.

venues.name: Villa Eva
venues.description: An enchanting villa offering a blend of elegance and charm, nestled within a lush private park providing stunning views of the Amalfi Coast. Perfect for couples seeking a romantic Italian wedding setting with beautiful gardens and Mediterranean atmosphere.

venues.name: Hotel Marincanto
venues.description: A magical movie-set location offering stunning views of Positano village and the picturesque bay. This charming hotel provides a romantic backdrop with terraces overlooking the Mediterranean, perfect for intimate celebrations and small weddings.

venues.name: Villa Magia
venues.description: A luxury villa offering breathtaking views from Positano's highest point. Experience elegance and local traditions in this exclusive setting for intimate events, featuring stunning panoramic terraces and Mediterranean architecture.

venues.name: Villa Rufolo
venues.description: A historic villa dating back to the 13th century, famous for its spectacular gardens that inspired Wagner's Parsifal. Features Norman-style architecture, beautiful terraced gardens with exotic flowers, and stunning views of the Amalfi Coast from its belvedere.

venues.name: Villa Valguarnera
venues.description: An 18th-century Baroque jewel featuring frescoed halls, lush Italian gardens, and sweeping sea views. Ceremonies unfold in ornate salons while al fresco receptions grace panoramic terraces. Accommodates up to 12 guests in opulent suites for intimate luxury celebrations.

venues.name: Villa Dorata
venues.description: A hilltop estate near baroque Noto with elegant suites, infinity pool, beautiful gardens, and sea view terraces. An exclusive wedding venue accommodating up to 120 guests in one of Sicily's most sought-after locations.

venues.name: Commenda di San Calogero
venues.description: A historic 14th-century former abbey and feudal estate transformed into a luxurious agrirelais. The property spans 100 hectares featuring lush Italian gardens, olive and citrus groves, and panoramic views of Mount Etna and the sea. Nestled in the Iblean plateau between Syracuse and Catania.

venues.name: Villa Erba
venues.description: A magnificent 19th-century villa set in beautiful parkland on Lake Como, once the residence of director Luchino Visconti. Features stunning lakeside gardens, elegant indoor halls, and serves as a premier venue for luxury events and weddings with breathtaking lake views.

venues.name: Le Ciel Santorini
venues.description: A luxurious wedding venue perched on the cliff side in northern Imerovigli, opened in 2015. Features a large open-air terrace with spectacular sea views for ceremonies, and a fully air-conditioned reception area with huge windows overlooking the Caldera. One of the only venues in Santorini with wheelchair accessibility.

venues.name: Santo Wines Winery
venues.description: A renowned winery perched at one of the highest points on the island, offering panoramic views of the Aegean Sea, volcano, and iconic sunsets. Features a beautifully designed ceremony terrace with white stone, Tiffany-style chairs, and white lanterns. Outdoor reception area with sunroof and panoramic caldera view.

venues.name: Aenaon Villas
venues.description: A boutique villa hotel built on the highest point of Santorini's caldera, epitomizing minimalist elegance with reimagined Cycladic architecture. Consists of seven luxurious villas offering breathtaking views of all points on the horizon. Ideal for intimate weddings and elopements with impressive outdoor spaces.

venues.name: Canaves Oia Suites
venues.description: A luxury hotel nestled on the iconic cliffs of Oia, embodying Greek island charm. Multiple venue options including Rooftop Venue (up to 40 guests), Sunset Terrace (up to 25 guests), and Panorama Balcony (up to 30 guests). Perched above the fishing town of Ammoudi with 180-degree panoramic views of the caldera.

venues.name: Rocabella Santorini
venues.description: A breathtaking wedding venue perched on the caldera cliffs in Imerovigli, offering panoramic views of the Aegean Sea. Features elegant spa facilities and romantic outdoor terraces perfect for ceremonies and receptions. Known for its stunning sunset views and traditional Cycladic architecture.

venues.name: Dana Villas & Infinity Suites
venues.description: A fairytale wedding venue located on the caldera cliff at 300m altitude in Firostefani, 10 minutes walk from Fira. Features unobstructed panoramic views of the caldera, volcanic island, and sunset. Perfect for intimate weddings with elegant terrace spaces. Over 3000 weddings hosted in 20+ years.

venues.name: Venetsanos Winery
venues.description: Historic winery designed by George Venetsanos in 1947, the first industrial winery on Santorini. Built on 4 levels overlooking the caldera, with an Upper Terrace of 250sqm for ceremonies and receptions. Located above Athinios Port with unique views of the caldera, Aegean Sea, and volcano.

venues.name: Grace Hotel Santorini, Auberge Resorts Collection
venues.description: A luxury boutique hotel perched on an ancient clifftop in Imerovigli, 8km from Santorini Airport. Part of Auberge Resorts Collection, offering ethereal coastal settings with sweeping Mediterranean backdrops. Features multiple stunning venues including the most impressive villa in the Cyclades for intimate or large celebrations.

venues.name: Katikies Hotel Santorini
venues.description: A leading luxury hotel in Oia, the first Santorini hotel to masterfully intertwine boutique luxury with natural settings. Features 27 guest rooms with infinity pools cascading toward the Aegean Sea. Multiple event spaces for weddings from small intimate ceremonies to standing cocktail receptions.

venues.name: Esperisma
venues.address: Fira, Santorini 84700, Greece (at Athina Luxury Suites)
venues.description: An ultimate white balcony for romantic ceremonies located on the caldera cliffs in Fira, on the territory of Athina Luxury Suites Hotel. Features spectacular views of the Aegean Sea and caldera magnificence. Perfect for intimate ceremonies, cocktail hours, and photo shoots.

venues.name: Santa Marina, A Luxury Collection Resort
venues.description: A luxury resort on a secluded peninsula overlooking the Aegean Sea with the only private beach on Mykonos. Features a traditional whitewashed stone chapel, luscious green lawns, and golden sand beach for ceremonies. Multiple restaurants, pool bars, and beach venues for receptions up to 300 guests.

venues.name: Mykonos Grand Hotel & Resort
venues.address: Ayios Yiannis, Agios Ioannis, Mykonos 84600, Greece
venues.description: A 5-star resort built in traditional Cycladic architecture on Agios Ioannis Beach, 4.2km from Mykonos Town. Features 96 rooms and suites across 5 acres, a private beach, 500sqm heated pool, spa, and outdoor amphitheater. Wedding chapel accommodates 25 indoors or 100 outdoors.

venues.name: Nammos Mykonos
venues.description: Iconic luxury beach club established in 2003 on Psarou Beach, a protected bay from Aegean winds. Offers berthing services, valet parking, private yacht transfers, helipad, spa, and 24-hour security. Perfect for glamorous beach weddings with arrival by Riva yacht, fireworks, and customized menus.

venues.name: SantAnna Mykonos
venues.description: The most luxurious beach club in Mykonos on Paraga Beach, founded in 2017. Features the largest seaside swimming pool in Europe (lagoon-shaped with seven private islands), Greek taverna, sushi bar, four cocktail bars, full-service spa and salon. Hosts exclusive events, DJ performances, and private parties.

venues.name: Mykonos Blu Grecotel
venues.description: A luxury beachfront resort designed like a whitewashed Cycladic village with direct access to Psarou Beach. Features 103 rooms, suites and villas, most with private terraces or pools. Multiple ceremony venues including Ocean Balcony (60 guests) and beach gazebo (170 guests). L'Archipel restaurant hosts 120 for receptions.

venues.name: Cavo Tagoo Mykonos
venues.address: Ormou Agiou Ioanni-Agiou Stefanou Str, Tagoo, Mykonos 84600, Greece
venues.description: A luxury 5-star hotel with 80 individually decorated rooms and suites in subtle blue, rose, or fuchsia nuances. Features wonderful views of Mykonos Town and the Aegean Sea, freshwater swimming pool, spa, and Kiku Gourmet Restaurant. Private hideaway retreat perfect for weddings and special occasions.

venues.name: Royal Myconian Resort
venues.description: A luxury resort perched on a secluded bay on sophisticated Elia Beach, the island's longest fine sand beach. Features outdoor terraces cascading toward the coastline, Sunset Terrace with panoramic views, and a Chapel dedicated to Saints Theodore and George. Can accommodate up to 350 wedding guests.

venues.name: Four Seasons Astir Palace Hotel Athens
venues.description: An iconic 5-star, 75-acre beach resort on the pine-tree Peninsula of Vouliagmeni, 30 minutes from the Acropolis. Features 8 restaurants and bars, spa with 10 treatment rooms, 5 tennis courts, and private beach. Multiple state-of-the-art indoor and outdoor venues with legendary Four Seasons service inspired by philoxenia.

venues.name: Grand Resort Lagonissi
venues.address: 40th km Athens - Sounion Avenue, Lagonissi 19010, Greece
venues.description: A luxurious 5-star destination on a tranquil 72-acre peninsula of the Athenian Riviera with stunning Saronic Gulf views. Offers flexible wedding options from intimate gatherings of 60 at Captain's House Bay to grand celebrations of 700 at Uranus and Cosmos Ballrooms. Multiple beachfront venues and lush gardens.

venues.name: Island Art & Taste
venues.address: 27th km Athens - Sounio Avenue, Varkiza 16672, Greece
venues.description: A prestigious venue since 1995 offering a private luxury estate experience on the Athenian Riviera. Six distinct entertainment spaces including gardens, dining terraces, and lounges. Accessible by helipad, private dock, or car. Grand Ciel venue holds 2,000 guests with private beach; Residence holds 1,000 guests.

venues.name: Lake Vouliagmeni
venues.description: A natural thermal lake surrounded by limestone cliffs and lush greenery in the heart of the Athenian Riviera. Brackish waters continuously replenished by sea and underground thermal springs. The Prive area accommodates 300-500 seated guests. Ideal for ceremonies when surrounding foliage is lush in spring and autumn.

venues.name: Cape Sounio Grecotel
venues.address: 67th km Athens - Sounion Avenue, Sounio 19500, Greece
venues.description: A splendid beachfront resort at the southern tip of Attica facing the famous Temple of Poseidon. Features 139 bungalows, suites and villas among pine trees. Yali Waterfront Restaurant holds 100-150 guests; beach venue accommodates 100-350 guests. 40 minutes from Athens Airport.

venues.name: Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel
venues.description: The most exclusive hotel in Greece, uniquely positioned on a peninsular stretch overlooking Mirabello Bay and the Aegean Sea. Features 78 suites and 40 villas, private beach, spa, and golf course. Wedding venues include Peninsula Lounge with yacht-like panoramic views, pool area with beach bar, and traditional Cretan chapel with ceiling painted by Alekos Fasianos.

venues.name: Domes of Elounda
venues.description: A landmark 5-star beachfront resort with stunning views over Mirabello Bay and the mysterious island of Spinalonga (UNESCO World Heritage Site). Multiple venue options: Spina Decks in olive grove (up to 80 guests), Private Chapel above beach (up to 40 guests), The Pier (12-16 guests), and 1910 Restaurant (80+ guests).

venues.name: Agreco Farm
venues.address: Adelianos Kampos, Adele Village, Rethymno 74100, Crete, Greece
venues.description: A 40,000sqm living 17th-century Cretan village and working organic farm with hillside views. Features private chapel 'St Nicholas' for religious services and village square for civil ceremonies. Alfresco dining for up to 200 guests in the courtyard; Taverna for 60 guests indoors. 2km from ocean, 7km from Rethymnon.

venues.name: Metohi Istoria
venues.address: Metohi Kato Daratsos, Chania 73100, Crete, Greece
venues.description: A 700-year-old Venetian estate among avocado, orange, and olive groves near Chania. Lovingly preserved versatile spaces including an old olive mill for ceremonies, grapevine-covered areas for cocktails, and fruit tree-lined lawns for dinner. Perfect blend of aristocratic elegance and natural grace.

venues.name: Reveli Venue & Villas
venues.description: A private estate in Akrotiri spanning 4,000sqm with sea and mountain views. Includes two luxury villas for on-site accommodation with entire estate available for exclusive use. Complete creative freedom for multi-day celebrations with ultimate privacy in the Cretan landscape.

venues.name: Markakis Estate
venues.description: A private wedding venue in Crete's inlands with Mediterranean reception areas under festoon lights and bougainvillea. Surrounded by olives and laurel trees for ultimate privacy. Features authentic Cretan hospitality and farm-to-table cuisine options.

venues.name: St. Paul's Bay Chapel
venues.address: St Paul's Bay, Lindos, Rhodes 85107, Greece
venues.description: One of the most stunning natural wedding venues in Rhodes - a traditional whitewashed Greek Orthodox Chapel in a secluded bay beneath the Acropolis of Lindos. Chapel accommodates 30-80 guests; purpose-built decked platform available for beach ceremonies. Multiple ceremonies daily Monday-Friday, 1-hour slots.

venues.name: Kallithea Springs
venues.description: Beautifully restored Italian thermal spring built in 1928, situated in the picturesque bay of Kallithea, 9km from Rhodes Town. Features beautiful gardens, white columns, mosaic and marble floors, and rocky cliffs with sea views. Ceremonies under a white dome with panoramic sea views. 2am licence for receptions.

venues.name: Sheraton Rhodes Resort
venues.description: A stunning 5-star resort carved into the hillside in Ixia, 4km from Rhodes Medieval Town (UNESCO World Heritage). Set in beautifully landscaped gardens with private beach and 2800sqm event space. 7th floor deck with white gazebo and Aegean views; pool and garden venues accommodate up to 450 guests.

venues.name: Lindos Weddings Venue
venues.description: A luxury wedding venue in the spectacular village of Lindos, one of the world's most popular wedding destinations over three decades. Features stunning views of the ancient Acropolis and Mediterranean Sea. Multiple ceremony and reception options in this picturesque whitewashed village.

venues.name: Grande Albergo Delle Rose
venues.description: A historic luxury hotel set in the heart of Rhodes Town with vast views of the famous Mandraki Harbour. Rich in history and heritage, the hotel pays meticulous attention to detail for weddings. Perfect for couples seeking a blend of historical ambiance and Mediterranean elegance.

venues.name: Villa Sylva
venues.description: A private luxury beachfront villa featured in James Bond's 'For Your Eyes Only' (1981). Nestled on a cliff edge overlooking the Ionian Sea and Pontikonissi (Mouse Island). 750sqm villa sleeps 18 in 9 en-suite bedrooms. Manicured gardens, 100-year-old church, and pool area. 10 minutes from Corfu Town.

venues.name: The Courti Estate
venues.description: A traditional 18th-century Venetian estate on 10 acres of ancient olive groves on the exclusive Corfu Riviera. Features a central manor house, large olive press, and private chapel. 9 luxurious bedrooms for 18 guests with 360-degree views of the Ionian Sea and countryside. 100m from nearest beach.

venues.name: Danilia Village
venues.description: A faithfully restored 1930s Corfiot village, filming location for James Bond's 'For Your Eyes Only' and ITV's 'The Durrells'. Features two village squares, a church, traditional cafe, open-air tavern, and Corfu's largest indoor tavern. Catered by professional Grecotel staff. 24 minutes from airport.

venues.name: Angsana Resort and Spa Corfu
venues.description: A breathtaking venue perched on a verdant hill next to crystal-clear Ionian Sea waters. Features award-winning spa, infinity pool, and decadent villa homes with private pools perfect for newlyweds. Combines Asian-inspired hospitality with Greek island beauty for unique wedding celebrations.

venues.name: Ekaterini Estate
venues.description: A hilltop estate above the village of Gastouri offering 360-degree views of Corfu in every direction. Features numerous terraces and lawns for ceremonies or photography, plus a colorful chapel for marriage blessings. Perfect blend of panoramic island views and elegant estate grounds.

venues.name: Kinsterna Hotel
venues.address: Agios Stefanos, Monemvasia 23070, Laconia, Peloponnese, Greece
venues.description: A faithfully restored Byzantine mansion on 25 acres with enchanting views of the fairytale castletown of Monemvasia. Features 52 rooms including 19 suites and one pool villa. Picturesque chapel of Zoodochos Pigi nearby for ceremonies. Perfect for traditional or rustic weddings in the historic Peloponnese.

venues.name: Amanzoe
venues.address: Kranidi, Porto Heli 21061, Argolis, Peloponnese, Greece
venues.description: An ultra-luxurious Aman resort on a hilltop overlooking the Aegean Sea, 2.5 hours from Athens. Features 38 Pavilions, 3 Beach Pavilions, and 12 Villas with private chefs and pools. Multiple venues including Amphitheatre, Fire Pit, Beach Club, and Multifunctional Room for weddings of all sizes.

venues.name: Costa Navarino
venues.address: Navarino Dunes, Costa Navarino 24001, Messinia, Peloponnese, Greece
venues.description: A premier sustainable destination with excellent facilities in southwest Peloponnese. Multiple luxury hotels including The Romanos (Luxury Collection) and Mandarin Oriental. Features championship golf courses, Anazoe Spa, pristine beaches, and archaeological sites. Ideal for large destination weddings.

venues.name: Nikki Beach Resort Porto Heli
venues.description: A luxury beach resort in the peaceful area of Porto Heli Bay with stunning views of the bay and sunset. Part of the glamorous Nikki Beach brand known for upscale beach club events worldwide. Features beachfront venues, pool areas, and elegant dining spaces for sophisticated celebrations.

venues.name: Cavo Alkyoni
venues.address: Avlaki Bay, Kassiopi, Corfu 49100, Ionian Islands, Greece
venues.description: A stunning venue within extensive, immaculately kept grounds above the bay of Avlaki. Comprises four well-appointed villas with accommodation for 40 guests. Features direct sea access, private tennis court, and luxurious 40m infinity pool. In-house wedding planner with access to the best local suppliers.

venues.name: Ktima Lindos
venues.description: A stunning venue combining rustic charm with breathtaking views, set in a beautiful estate surrounded by lush olive groves. Offers both indoor and outdoor spaces for ceremonies and receptions. The Mediterranean views and peaceful surroundings create an ideal setting for sophisticated yet tranquil weddings.

venues.name: Acro Suites Crete
venues.description: A hidden gem on Crete's northern coast offering panoramic views of the Cretan Sea. Architecture seamlessly blends organic and bohemian design with contemporary style. Perfect for micro-weddings, intimate celebrations, and romantic elopements in a serene setting above the Mediterranean.

venues.name: St. Nicolas Bay Resort
venues.description: A secluded beachfront boutique resort near Agios Nikolaos featuring Mediterranean architecture blending traditional and modern elements. Features private beach, five restaurants, ultimate privacy, and casual elegance. Intimate setting perfect for romantic destination weddings in eastern Crete.

venues.name: Masia Cabellut
venues.description: A newly restored 12th-century masia set within 30 hectares of private valley with vineyards and olive trees. Features a 300 sq meter party amphitheatre, multiple ceremony locations including the Enchanted Forest, and award-winning estate wines. Exclusive use with no noise restrictions or curfew.

venues.name: Can Riera de la Pineda
venues.description: A 10th-century farmhouse (masia) nestled in a secluded valley near Girona. Restored Roman villa surrounded by woods, meadows and mountains, presided over by the Castillo de Monsoliu. Features 9 double bedrooms with private bathrooms for up to 18 overnight guests.

venues.name: Castell de Sant Maral
venues.address: Ctra. de Sant Cugat a Cerdanyola, s/n, 08290 Cerdanyola del Valls, Barcelona, Spain
venues.description: A 13th-century castle just 20 minutes from Barcelona city center. Features the Invernadero Pavilion (500 m) for up to 500 seated guests, atmospheric Wine Cellar for 125 guests, and outdoor grounds for up to 1,000. Belongs to the same noble lineage for over 700 years. Exclusive one event per day policy.

venues.name: Castell de Tamarit
venues.description: A 13th-century Romanesque castle facing the Mediterranean Sea, surrounded by a wooded area. Features a main room with capacity up to 300 guests and cocktail areas in the gardens by the sea. Located 10 minutes from Tarragona with ample parking.

venues.name: La Baronia
venues.address: Ctra. de Mollet a Moi, km 23.800, 08182 Sant Feliu de Codines, Barcelona, Spain
venues.description: Originally built over a 17th-century farmhouse, redesigned by Joan Rubi i Bellver, a disciple of Antoni Gaud. Exclusive access to the entire property with capacity for up to 300 guests. Located 40 minutes from Barcelona.

venues.name: Mas Torroella
venues.description: A 14th-century Catalan manor house set in the rolling hills of the Gavarres Natural Park. Accommodates 30 guests overnight across 11 bedrooms. Features XV century vaulted ceiling Hall, secret forest, and spacious gardens. 40 minutes from Girona Airport, 90 minutes from Barcelona.

venues.name: Finca Mas Solers
venues.address: Sant Pere de Ribes, 08810, Barcelona, Spain
venues.description: A 19th-century mansion on 8 hectares of gardens and woods with origins dating to the 13th century. Features the Grand Hispano Suiza Room (640-1,000 guests), Salon Bacarr, Monaco Gardens, and Amphitheatre. Just 20 minutes from Barcelona and 5 minutes from Sitges.

venues.name: Torre del Veguer
venues.address: Urb. Torre del Veguer, 08810 Sant Pere de Ribes, Barcelona, Spain
