venues.description: A 14th-century building with medieval origins, now a unique winery with picturesque vineyards. Features interior rooms, gardens, vineyards and pool. Located in the Garraf region near Sitges.

venues.name: Son Marroig
venues.address: Carretera Ctra. Ma-10 de Valldemossa-Dei, km. 65.5, 07179 Dey, Mallorca, Spain
venues.description: Historic residence of Archduke Ludwig Salvator of Austria with iconic white temple and breathtaking backdrop of mountains, sea, and stunning sunsets. Located in the UNESCO World Heritage Tramuntana Mountains. Hired as an empty canvas venue. 45 minutes from Palma Airport.

venues.name: La Fortaleza
venues.address: Punta de la Avanzada, Puerto Pollensa, Mallorca, Spain
venues.description: A 17th-century fortress on a private peninsula with exceptional views and over 87,000 square meters. Originally built to defend against pirate attacks. Hosted Rafael Nadal's wedding in 2020 and Joey King's wedding in 2023. One of Mallorca's most exclusive venues.

venues.name: Cap Rocat
venues.address: Ctra. d'Enderrocat, s/n, 07609 Cala Blava, Mallorca, Spain
venues.description: A former military fortress in a 30-hectare nature reserve with 2km of protected coast. Features The Lookout and Panoramic Terrace with stunning sunset views over Palma's bay. Set in 88 acres with private rock cliff beach and salt water pool. 15 minutes from Palma Airport.

venues.name: Belmond La Residencia
venues.address: Son Canals, s/n, 07179 Dei, Mallorca, Spain
venues.description: A luxury hotel in the artistic village of Dei with El Olivo Terrace offering panoramic Mediterranean views. Features elegant indoor spaces and beautiful gardens in the heart of the Tramuntana Mountains.

venues.name: Castell Son Claret
venues.address: Carretera Es Capdell, km 1.7, 07196 Es Capdell, Calvi, Mallorca, Spain
venues.description: A restored 19th-century castle on a private 132-hectare estate with palm-lined avenues and lush gardens. Features Michelin-starred restaurant Sa Clastra, 41 rooms, and option for exclusive property rental. 25 minutes from Palma.

venues.name: The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca Resort
venues.address: Carretera Palma-Andratx 19, 07181 Portals Nous, Mallorca, Spain
venues.description: Oceanfront luxury resort overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Features large lawns near Palma with beautiful coastal views. 15-minute stroll from Puerto Portals, 20 minutes from both Palma Airport and city centre.

venues.name: Son Berga
venues.description: A 16th-century estate at the foot of the Serra de Tramuntana UNESCO World Heritage site. Features rustic-style Son Berga Hall for up to 200 guests, charming courtyards, orange groves, and bird eye terraces. Music allowed outdoors until midnight, then inside until 2am.

venues.name: Son Doblons
venues.description: An exceptional 16th-century estate spanning 130 hectares with seven distinct gardens covering 15,000 m. Features fountains, pools, ponds, and majestic gardens with sea views. Perfect for multi-day events including Indian weddings. 60 minutes from Palma.

venues.name: Finca Son Mir
venues.address: Cam vell de Sineu km 7.2, N 253, Palma de Mallorca, Spain
venues.description: A 17th-century estate carefully restored with original architectural elements. Features 5 suites for overnight guests. Events from 5pm to 3am. Located just 10 minutes from Palma city center. Estate produces its own olive oil.

venues.name: Castillo Hotel Son Vida
venues.address: Carrer Raixa, 2, Son Vida, 07013 Palma, Mallorca, Spain
venues.description: A luxury collection hotel set in a historic castle overlooking Palma. Features elegant ballrooms, manicured gardens, and panoramic views of the bay and city. Part of the prestigious Son Vida estate.

venues.name: Elixir Ibiza
venues.address: Cala Codolar Beach, San Jose, 07830 Ibiza, Spain
venues.description: Ibiza's only dedicated wedding venue on the quiet sandy beach of Cala Codolar. Features spectacular views of Es Vedr and the Mediterranean. Includes ceremonial terrace, aperitif chill-out area, shaded banqueting area, and custom-built nightclub for dancing.

venues.name: Atzar Agroturismo
venues.address: Carretera de Sant Joan, km 15, 07840 Santa Eulalia del Ro, Ibiza, Spain
venues.description: An Ibizan agroturismo hotel in the heart of the countryside with extensive gardens, orange groves, and a renowned spa. Features multiple ceremony and reception spaces with bohemian-luxury aesthetic. Also operates Atzar Beach at Cala Nova.

venues.name: Amante Ibiza
venues.address: Cala Sol d'en Serra, Calle Afueras, s/n, Cala Llonga, Ibiza, Spain
venues.description: A clifftop venue perched above Sol D'en Serra bay with panoramic Mediterranean views. Set over three levels leading to a private beach. Available for exclusive hire. Venue hire from 12,500-28,000 depending on season. Closed in winter.

venues.name: Can Gall
venues.address: Carretera San Juan, km 17.2, San Juan, Ibiza, Spain
venues.description: A 350-year-old Ibizan estate in the heart of the island, restored to preserve traditional essence while offering modern comforts. Operating as a wedding venue since 2004. 30 minutes from Ibiza Airport with peaceful countryside setting.

venues.name: 7Pines Resort Ibiza
venues.address: Calle Puig Delfin s/n, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza, Spain
venues.description: A luxury clifftop resort between Cala Conta and Cala Codolar with legendary Es Vedr views. Features Cliff Terrace (100 guests), Cone Club (120 guests), and Event Center. Prime sunset location on the west coast.

venues.name: Nikki Beach Ibiza
venues.address: Carretera Santa Eulalia, Santa Eulalia del Ro, Ibiza, Spain
venues.description: Iconic beach club on the east coast with signature all-white dcor and bohemian luxury ambiance. Beach area for ceremonies and cocktails, with indoor area available after midnight. Minimum spend from 10,000.

venues.name: Cotton Beach Club
venues.address: Carrer Posta de Sol, 21, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza, Spain
venues.description: Ultra-chic all-white beach club in Cala Tarida with first-class cuisine and 5-star service. Features Grand Terrace with panoramic views and stylish indoor lounge. Best months: May, June, September, October. 22 minutes from Ibiza Airport.

venues.name: Cas Gasi
venues.address: Camino Viejo de Sant Mateu, s/n, 07814 Santa Gertrudis, Ibiza, Spain
venues.description: A boutique hotel in an 1880 country house on 4 hectares in the heart of the island countryside. Exclusive use available with accommodation for limited overnight guests. Maximum 180 for reception and meal. Transitioning to Soho House ownership.

venues.name: Finca Cortesin
venues.address: Carretera de Casares, km 2, 29690 Casares, Mlaga, Spain
venues.description: An ultra-luxury resort and golf destination between Marbella and Sotogrande. Features Roman amphitheatre, intimate chapel, elegant terraces, and award-winning cuisine. Surrounded by three golf courses with Mediterranean and mountain views. 50 minutes from Malaga Airport.

venues.name: Anantara Villa Padierna Palace
venues.address: Ctra. de Cdiz, Km. 166, Urb. Los Flamingos Golf, 29679 Benahavis, Mlaga, Spain
venues.description: An opulent Tuscan-inspired resort in the hills of Benahavis with Roman amphitheatre (300 guests), intimate chapel (20 guests), and stunning gardens. Surrounded by three golf courses, a lake, and Mediterranean views. 10 minutes from beach, 15 minutes from Marbella.

venues.name: Marbella Club Hotel
venues.address: Bulevar Prncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe, s/n, 29602 Marbella, Mlaga, Spain
venues.description: Legendary hotel on Marbella's Golden Mile featuring Villa del Mar with 6,200 m for up to 250 diners. Includes Alhambra-inspired gardens, 6 suites, private hammam, cinema, infinity pool, and direct beach access. Also offers MC Beach chiringuito for 150 guests.

venues.name: Puente Romano Beach Resort
venues.address: Bulevar Prncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe, s/n, 29602 Marbella, Mlaga, Spain
venues.description: A sprawling resort on 55 hectares of beachside gardens on Marbella's Golden Mile. Features Saln Andaluca (688 m, 450 guests), Villa La Pereza with private garden (90 guests), and Chambao beach club. Multiple restaurants and boutique pool club.

venues.name: Hacienda de San Rafael
venues.address: Carretera Nacional IV (km 594), 41730 Las Cabezas de San Juan, Seville, Spain
venues.description: An award-winning 18th-century olive estate converted to a boutique hideaway. Features 6 acres of manicured gardens, three swimming pools, olive groves, and slow-food cuisine. Accessible to 5 international airports. 40 minutes from Seville.

venues.name: Cortijo El Esparragal
venues.address: Highway A-66 Seville-Mrida, Salida 795, 41860 Gerena, Seville, Spain
venues.description: A 17th-century former Hieronymite convent on a 6,300-acre agricultural estate. Features La Encina Celebration Hall for up to 400 guests, Patio Flamenco, 15,000+ m of gardens, and 21 rooms. Just 15 minutes from Seville.

venues.name: Hacienda El Vizir
venues.address: Carretera Gines-Espartinas, km, 41807 Espartinas, Seville, Spain
venues.description: A spectacular Andalusian-style hacienda with Arab influences in the Aljarafe region. Features indoor hall (600 guests), Saln Vizir with Moorish coffered ceiling (650 guests), 2,000+ m of gardens, and its own bullring (1,000 capacity). 15 minutes from Seville.

venues.name: Hacienda Molinillos
venues.description: A traditional Andalusian hacienda surrounded by olive groves, perfect for countryside weddings with elegance and authenticity. Features beautiful courtyards, whitewashed walls, and classic Andalusian architecture.

venues.name: Castillo de Batres
venues.address: Av. de la Fuente del Chorro, 1, 28976 Batres, Madrid, Spain
venues.description: A legendary Renaissance Castle declared a Historic-Artistic Site in 1970. Features a 14th-century Patio de Armas with climate-controlled glass enclosure, gardens for outdoor ceremonies, and exclusive catering by 4 chefs including 2 Michelin-starred. 30 km from Madrid.

venues.name: Castillo de Viuelas
venues.address: Fuencarral-El Pardo, 28048 Castillo de Viuelas, Madrid, Spain
venues.description: A stunning 17th-century castle in a protected nature reserve. Three venues: Pabelln de Caza (600 guests), Pabelln Fuente Tena (200 guests), and the castle itself. Surrounded by vast green landscapes. 20 km from central Madrid.

venues.name: Palacio de los Duques Gran Meli
venues.address: Calle de la Princesa, 27, 28008 Madrid, Spain
venues.description: A 5-star hotel combining a 13th-century convent and 19th-century palace, updated in avant-garde style. Located in Madrid de los Austrias next to the Royal Palace. Features 1,000 m historic garden and three restaurants. Honeymoon packages available.

venues.name: Finca Aal Cachucho
venues.description: An unforgettable wedding estate just 20 minutes from Madrid with a distinctive eco-hotel offering endless countryside views and unique, bold character. Starting from 2,100 for weekdays to 5,450 for Saturday high season.

venues.name: Finca El Gasco
venues.description: A rustic yet elegant finca 40 minutes from Madrid centre, ideal for destination weddings year-round. Features wide green lawns framed by old stone, with a balance of countryside openness and historic atmosphere.

venues.name: Hotel Mara Cristina
venues.address: Paseo Repblica Argentina, 4, 20004 San Sebastin, Gipuzkoa, Spain
venues.description: San Sebastin's most luxurious hotel since 1912, a Belle poque mansion on the Urumea river. Features 138 rooms, three palatial reception rooms (Ibaia 282 m, Elcano 206 m, Zubia 109 m) with natural daylight. Capacity up to 320 guests.

venues.name: Miramar Palace
venues.address: Paseo de Miraconcha 48, 20007 Donostia / San Sebastin, Gipuzkoa, Spain
venues.description: A late 19th-century palace built for Queen Maria Christina between La Concha and Ondarreta beaches. Features 11 rooms and halls (35-190 capacity), 30,000+ m of gardens with sea views. Works with various caterers without exclusivity.

venues.name: Akelarre
venues.address: Paseo Padre Orkolaga, 56 (Monte Igeldo), 20008 Donostia / San Sebastin, Spain
venues.description: A 3-Michelin-star restaurant with luxury hotel and spa on Mount Igeldo, overlooking the Bay of Biscay. Opened in 1970 by chef Pedro Subijana, with hotel rooms and spa added in 2017. Stunning coastal views just 10 minutes from San Sebastin center.

venues.name: Sagarlore
venues.description: A modern country house hotel in the heart of Basque cider country, surrounded by apple trees. Opened in 2018 in a restored old farmhouse. Features 16 rooms with natural light. Less than 7 km from San Sebastin center.

venues.name: Finca El Campillo
venues.description: A woodland estate north of Madrid with flexible indoor/outdoor spaces. Rustic elegance surrounded by nature with mountain backdrop. Ideal for couples seeking a countryside wedding near the capital.

venues.name: Antigua Fbrica de Harinas
venues.description: A hidden paradise about 40 minutes from Madrid centre. Once a flour mill, now a romantic hideaway with cypress-lined paths, bridges over canals, and textured stone corners with cinematic character. Exceptional service quality.

venues.name: Masia Can Ramonet
venues.address: Sant Pere de Ribes, Garraf Natural Park, Barcelona, Spain
venues.description: A Mediterranean rustic villa in the Garraf Natural Park near Sitges. Features authentic Catalan architecture with covered and outdoor spaces for up to 200 guests. Close to Barcelona with beautiful countryside setting.

venues.name: Fairmont Le Montreux Palace
venues.description: A Belle-poque architectural gem built in 1906, this five-star luxury hotel offers 236 rooms and suites, 15 event spaces including the magnificent Salle des Ftes ballroom. Features frescoed ceilings, crystal chandeliers, and stunning views of Lake Geneva and the Alps. Hosted countless celebrity weddings and events.

venues.name: Chteau de Chillon
venues.description: Medieval island castle dating to the 12th century, one of Europe's most visited medieval castles. Features the magnificent Aula Magna with 13th-century lakeside windows and the Castellan's Dining Hall with oak columns and coffered ceilings from the 15th century. Truly fairytale setting for weddings.

venues.name: Beau-Rivage Palace
venues.description: Award-winning 5-star hotel set in 4 hectares of private park on Lake Geneva shores. Since 1861, offering 168 rooms and suites with lake and Alpine views. Features the majestic Sandoz Room (430 m) for up to 600 cocktail guests, the Rotonde Room, and the Belle poque paddle steamer Le Montreux for ceremonies on the water.

venues.name: Clos de la Rpublique
venues.address: Route de la Petite Corniche 7, 1071 Rivaz, Switzerland
venues.description: Charming winery house in the UNESCO-listed Lavaux vineyard terraces with incredible views over Lake Geneva. Perfect for couples seeking an authentic vineyard wedding experience surrounded by centuries-old terraced vineyards and stunning lake panoramas.

venues.name: Le Baron Tavernier - Le Deck
venues.description: Nestled in the UNESCO-listed Lavaux vineyards, Le Deck at Htel Le Baron Tavernier offers one of the best terraces in the region with breathtaking views over Lake Geneva. An unforgettable wedding venue combining wine heritage with stunning panoramic scenery.

venues.name: Royal Savoy Hotel & Spa
venues.description: Originally opened in 1909, this 5-star hotel blends Belle poque grandeur with contemporary design. Features 1200 m of event spaces including Lausanne's largest ballroom (570 m) accommodating up to 300 guests. Spectacular terrace with views of Lake Geneva and the Alps.

venues.name: Htel des Trois Couronnes
venues.description: Built in 1842 on the shores of Lake Geneva, this 5-star superior hotel offers 71 rooms with stunning lake and Alpine views. Features 16 meeting rooms, a Michelin-starred restaurant, ballroom for receptions, and terrace for cocktails. One of the most enchanting panoramas in Switzerland.

venues.name: Maison Buttin-de-Los
venues.description: An 18th-century mansion overlooking the UNESCO-listed Lavaux Vineyard Landscape, restored in 1917 with its own working vineyard. Features stunning views of Lake Geneva, perfect for tent-covered celebrations on the garden terrace. Ideal for wine and history lovers alike.

venues.name: Chteau Gtsch
venues.description: A 19th-century neo-Romantic castle inspired by Bavaria's Neuschwanstein, overlooking Lake Lucerne and Rigi Mountain. Features terraces for ceremonies, castle gardens for larger events, and several adaptable indoor spaces. Just minutes from Lucerne's center.

venues.name: Villa Honegg
venues.description: Exclusive five-star boutique hotel high above Brgenstock with picture-postcard views of Lake Lucerne. Offers the option of booking the entire venue for a completely personalized, intimate wedding experience. Features stunning infinity pool and panoramic restaurant seating up to 60 guests.

venues.name: Mandarin Oriental Palace, Luzern
venues.description: Nestled on the enchanting shores of Lake Lucerne, offering a picturesque setting that epitomizes romance and sophistication. Features the Edelweiss Ballroom with outdoor terrace for private receptions, ideal for lake-side weddings, anniversaries, and gala dinners.

venues.name: St. Charles Hall
venues.description: Neo-Baroque mansion built in the early 20th century on the shores of Lake Lucerne overlooking the Alps. Features the majestic Rittersaal for banquets, the elegant Wienersaal, cozy Tapestry Room, and a romantic chapel. Surrounded by gardens, romantic sculptures, and panoramic terraces.

venues.name: Park Hotel Vitznau
venues.description: A luxury 5-star hotel on the shores of Lake Lucerne offering a variety of event rooms in different styles. Can accommodate weddings of up to 300 guests for the most sophisticated celebrations.

venues.name: Hotel Schweizerhof Luzern
venues.description: Historic luxury hotel near the Old Town, directly on Lake Lucerne's shore. Family-run since 1861 with parts under monument protection. Various halls, restaurants, rooms, and suites provide seating for up to 380 people.

venues.name: Art Deco Hotel Montana
venues.description: Iconic Art Deco building from 1910 with its own funicular for ascending from the city. Offers an elegant and unique setting above Lake Lucerne. The covered Scala terrace and Art Deco Room can accommodate 40-120 guests depending on configuration.

venues.name: Brgenstock Resort Lake Lucerne
venues.description: Premier wedding venue perched 500 meters above Lake Lucerne. Encompasses 383 rooms in four hotels, 12 restaurants and bars, 10,000 m spa. Features Lakeview Ballroom (600 guests), Salle Palace (100-200 guests), and Diamond Domes (600 guests). Where Audrey Hepburn tied the knot.

venues.name: Wasserschloss Wyher
venues.description: Unique water castle located on an island in the middle of a moat. One of the finest historic sites in Canton Lucerne, beautifully restored. The Great Hall with historic wooden beams and stone walls can comfortably accommodate up to 200 people.

venues.name: Park Weggis
venues.description: Five-star Relais & Chteaux hotel on Lake Lucerne's shore with private lake access, beachfront, and boat dock. Features 52 rooms, multiple dining venues including Sparks (15 GaultMillau points), Japanese garden, spa cottages, and state-of-the-art event hall. Dating back to 1875.

venues.name: The Dolder Grand
venues.description: Perched high above Zurich offering views of both lakes and mountains. One of Switzerland's most beautiful wedding venues combining stunning natural surroundings with world-class luxury. Features multiple event spaces, award-winning restaurants, and a renowned spa.

venues.name: Zunfthaus zur Meisen
venues.description: Stately house built in 1757 in French style as a baroque city palace. This former guild house is today one of the most sought-after wedding venues in Switzerland. Located in Zurich's old town with elegant period rooms.

venues.name: Widder Hotel
venues.description: 5-star boutique hotel in renovated houses dating back to the 12th century, mixing medieval heritage with modern amenities. Located in Zurich's historic Old Town, featuring 49 unique guestrooms and eight event rooms (24-220 m) with state-of-the-art technology. Member of Leading Hotels of the World.

venues.name: CERVO Mountain Resort
venues.description: World-class resort for getaways and events nestled in Zermatt. Brings globally minded, cosmopolitan feel while prioritizing sustainability. Features 54 rooms and suites plus seven lodges, combining modern design with alpine feel-good factor and exceptional Matterhorn views.

venues.name: Riffelalp Resort 2222m
venues.description: Europe's highest luxury hotel at 2,222m altitude, providing spectacular mountain panorama with exceptional Matterhorn views. Features two accessible chapels - the 1886 Herz Jesu chapel for religious ceremonies and The Church chapel for civil ceremonies. Accessible by Gornergrat railway.

venues.name: Mont Cervin Palace
venues.description: 5-star luxury hotel in the heart of Zermatt with over 160 years of history. Features Zermatt's largest conference hall and cozy private celebration spaces. Offers 150 splendid rooms and suites, most with Matterhorn views. Wedding celebrations can accommodate 10-360 guests.

venues.name: Grand Hotel Zermatterhof
venues.description: Since 1879, this traditional luxury hotel in central Zermatt has offered 5-star comfort and elegance. Ideal for fairy-tale Alpine weddings surrounded by 29 4,000-metre peaks. Combines historical grandeur with modern comfort.

venues.name: The Chedi Andermatt
venues.description: Contemporary masterpiece blending Swiss tradition with Asian influences, designed by Jean-Michel Gathy. Features 119 rooms and suites, award-winning spa, 200+ open fireplaces. Wedding venues include The Library (100 guests), Wine Library (35 guests), and The Japanese at Gtsch (60 guests) - Europe's highest Michelin-starred restaurant.

venues.name: LeCrans Hotel & Spa
venues.description: Exclusive 5-star mountain retreat with 14 keys at 1650m altitude, offering breathtaking views of the Alps and Mont Blanc. Each themed room features fireplace, whirlpool bath. LeMontBlanc restaurant holds 17 GaultMillau points and one Michelin star. Perfect chalet-style atmosphere for intimate weddings.

venues.name: Hostellerie du Pas de l'Ours
venues.address: Rue du Pas de l'Ours 41, 3963 Crans-Montana, Switzerland
venues.description: 5-star Relais & Chteaux boutique hotel in the heart of Crans-Montana with breathtaking mountain views. Features Michelin-starred cuisine by Chef Franck Reynaud (18/20 GaultMillau). A true mountain chalet with cozy lounge, central fireplace, and sublime views for intimate celebrations.

venues.name: Victoria Jungfrau Grand Hotel
venues.description: UNESCO world heritage 5-star hotel in the heart of Interlaken, one of the most luxurious venues near the Swiss Alps. Offers symbolic ceremonies in castle gardens or on private lakeside terrace. Majestic Jungfrau mountain views, timeless elegance, and exceptional service.

venues.name: Schloss Oberhofen
venues.address: Schloss Oberhofen, 3653 Oberhofen am Thunersee, Switzerland
venues.description: Romantic lakeside castle with a keep dating from circa 1200 and one of the most beautiful parks in the Alpine region. Features 15th-century castle chapel, Sommersaal, lake tower (Seetrmli) extending over the lake. Perfect fairytale setting for ceremonies and receptions.

venues.name: Schloss Spiez
venues.description: Winner of Swiss Location Award 2022 & 2023 (9.1/10 rating). 1000-year-old castle church and medieval castle picturesquely above Lake Thun in Spiezer vineyards. Features castle chapel for ceremonies, romantic wedding room for civil ceremonies, and castle gardens with fantastic views.

venues.name: Schloss Schadau
venues.description: Historic Swiss castle hotel directly on Lake Thun, a member of Swiss Historic Hotels. Offers unique setting for civil weddings, aperitifs, and banquets with views of the Bernese Alps. One of the most romantic castle venues in the region.

venues.name: Harder Kulm
venues.description: Mountaintop venue perched high above Interlaken offering panoramic views of the town, Lake Thun, Lake Brienz, and surrounding mountains. Accessible by funicular, the restaurant serves as an exquisite reception venue with breathtaking Alpine backdrop.

venues.name: Seehotel Bnigen
venues.description: Lakeside hotel combining natural beauty with modern elegance. Stunning Lake Brienz views, stylish accommodations, and impeccable service. Offers couples a serene and unforgettable setting for wedding celebrations.

venues.name: Gstaad Palace
venues.description: Five-star landmark hotel rising from the forest like a fairy-tale castle since 1913. Family-operated for three generations with 90 rooms and suites. Features Salle Baccarat ballroom (230 banquet/350 reception), marquee option on tennis court. Has hosted Elizabeth Taylor, Grace Kelly, and Roger Moore.

venues.name: The Alpina Gstaad
venues.description: Five-star superior hotel redefining luxury and Alpine chic, opened December 2012. Set on 5 acres with 56 suites and rooms. Features 240 m ballroom (banquet 150, cocktails 330), Michelin-starred restaurant, 1,700-label wine cellar, and Switzerland's first Six Senses Spa.

venues.name: Lenkerhof Gourmet Spa Resort
venues.description: Exclusive 5-star superior Relais & Chteaux hotel with easy-going atmosphere. Offers ceremonies at Bhlenberg meadow with alpine panorama or in beautiful churches. Features three restaurants including Spettacolo (16 GaultMillau), 2,000 m wellness with Europe's strongest Alpine spring.

venues.name: Badrutt's Palace Hotel
venues.description: Legendary hotel opened 1896, still family-owned. 157 rooms including 37 suites with Alpine views. Features Madonna Room (fully licensed for civil weddings), Veranda East with lake views, and Embassy Ballroom where Marlene Dietrich performed. Accommodates 20-450 guests. Can be exclusively hired.

venues.name: Grand Hotel des Bains Kempinski
venues.description: Iconic 1864 building combining European luxury with Alpine views. Only 5-star hotel in St. Moritz with direct cable car access. Features 184 rooms and 27 residences, Grand Restaurant Les Saisons (264 guests), NEORA restaurant, and 2,800 m Kempinski Alpine Spa. Weddings for up to 300 guests.

venues.name: Suvretta House
venues.description: Fairytale castle hotel since 1912, family-owned by Candrian-Bon family. Features 176 rooms and suites, 4,670 m wellness area, private ski lift with ski-in/ski-out access. Banqueting for up to 350 guests. Regina Pacis chapel nearby for ceremonies.

venues.name: Kulm Hotel St. Moritz
venues.description: Pioneer of Engadin tourism since 1856, where Switzerland's first electric light shone in 1879. Features 150 rooms and suites, seven restaurants. Corviglia Hall accommodates 360 banquet guests (600 reception). Kulm Park offers stunning outdoor ceremonies. Six event spaces for up to 500 guests.

venues.name: Grand Hotel Kronenhof
venues.description: 5-star superior grand hotel in Pontresina in the magnificent Upper Engadine landscape. Features elegant wedding venues with breathtaking mountain backdrops, dedicated wedding planning team, in-house florist, and chef de cuisine for personalized celebrations.

venues.name: Nira Alpina
venues.description: 4-star superior design hotel at the foot of Corvatsch with direct cable car access. Features 70 modern rooms with balconies and panoramic views of Lake Silvaplana and Engadin mountains. Rooftop restaurant with tailored menus, Shanti Spa, conference room for up to 60 people.

venues.name: Villa Principe Leopoldo
venues.description: Iconic luxury villa overlooking Lake Lugano, classic choice for couples seeking refined elegance. Features six elegant halls, magnificent panoramic terraces and gardens, and impeccable service. Perfect blend of romance and sophistication in Ticino.

venues.name: Grand Hotel Villa Castagnola
venues.description: Opulent 5-star hotel with lakeside views, lush gardens, and historic architecture. Features 6th-century chapel (35-40 guests) and Grecian-styled grand hall (80 guests seated). Known for elegant, sophisticated celebrations up to EUR 42,000 for buyout.

venues.name: Hotel Splendide Royal
venues.description: One of the best wedding venues on Lake Lugano with breath-taking views and scenery. Exceptional position just metres from the lake with stunning Alpine views in the distance. Features mirrored waters and dreamlike romantic setting.

venues.name: Swiss Diamond Hotel
venues.address: Riva Lago di Lugano, 6921 Vico Morcote, Switzerland
venues.description: Award-winning 5-star wedding venue (2024 Swiss award), the only 5-star hotel directly on Lake Lugano shores with private boat mooring. Features 84 rooms and suites, gorgeous terrace with panoramic lake views, lakeside pool. Accommodates up to 160 guests.

venues.name: Moncucchetto
venues.description: Elegant vineyard venue designed by renowned architect Mario Botta, committed to sustainability and exceptional wine production. Features beautiful views of Lugano's hills and up to 100-guest capacity. Ideal for wine and food lovers seeking intimate culinary-focused weddings.

venues.name: Castello di Morcote
venues.address: Via Cantine di Sotto, 6922 Morcote, Switzerland
venues.description: Romantic castle venue offering an extraordinary blend of history and charm in one of Switzerland's most beautiful villages. Space for up to 160 guests with additional marquee options. Ideal for couples dreaming of a vineyard or castle wedding in Ticino.

venues.name: Hotel Eden Roc
venues.description: Multi-award-winning 5-star luxury hotel on Lake Maggiore shores, Switzerland's only true beach resort. Features private beach, panoramic landing stage with marina, pontile for ceremonies over the water, 2-star Michelin La Brezza restaurant. Ranked 2nd best Luxury Lake Side Resort in Switzerland.

venues.name: Giardino Ascona
venues.description: 5-star hotel in Mediterranean park setting near Lake Maggiore with lemon trees, carp pond, fountains, and olive grove. Open April-October with 71 elegant rooms. Ceremonies in garden, up to 56 guests indoors or 120 outdoors. Features Ecco fine dining restaurant. Full buyout available.

venues.name: Villa Emden - Brissago Islands
venues.description: Unique wedding venue on a private island in Lake Maggiore, accessible only by boat. Historic neoclassical villa (1927) surrounded by 2.5-acre botanical garden with 1,700 subtropical plant species. Features Verana Ascona, Sala Camino, Veranda Brissago. Capacity up to 120 guests indoors.

venues.name: Castello del Sole Beach Resort & Spa
venues.description: 5-star superior Relais & Chteaux hotel with Ticino's largest hotel park (14 hectares) and private beach on Lake Maggiore. Features sweeping romantic parklands, Michelin-starred Locanda Barbarossa restaurant (18 GaultMillau points). Among Leading Hotels of the World.

venues.name: Grand Resort Bad Ragaz
venues.description: Unique combination of 5-star luxury resort and leading medical expertise, one hour from Zurich. Features Grand Hotel Quellenhof, 233 rooms and suites, Kursaal Business Center (8 rooms for up to 300 guests), seven restaurants with 6 Michelin stars total, thermal baths, and two golf courses.

venues.name: Waldhaus Flims
venues.address: Via dil Parc 3, 7018 Flims Waldhaus, Switzerland
venues.description: 5-star superior resort named 6th most beautiful wedding location in Switzerland (Swiss Location Awards). Over 140 years of tradition, Switzerland's largest hotel park (200,000 m). Features historical Art Nouveau ballroom (up to 500 guests), four Gault & Millau and Michelin-awarded restaurants, 3000 m spa. Licensed for civil ceremonies.

venues.name: Chateau de Fonscolombe
venues.address: Route de Saint-Canadet, 13610 Le Puy-Sainte-Reparade, France
venues.description: An 18th-century Relais & Chateaux 5-star hotel set within 200 hectares of olive orchards, vineyards, and gardens. Features a Michelin-starred restaurant, spa, pool, and an 18th-century chapel. Beautifully restored rooms with expansive gardens near Aix-en-Provence.

price_range.notes: Privatization rate from 32,000 EUR per night including 50 rooms

venues.name: Chateau La Tour Vaucros
venues.description: A historic estate in the heart of Provence with rich history dating back to the 11th century, featuring 16th and 17th-century architecture. Surrounded by Provencal gardens, ideally situated near Avignon, L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue, and Chateauneuf-du-Pape.

venues.name: Le Mas des Poiriers
venues.address: Private Island along the Rhone River, near Avignon, France
venues.description: An 18th-century Provencal farmhouse on a private island along the Rhone River, spanning 65 acres of pear orchards, sunflower fields, and manicured gardens. Epitomizes Provencal splendor with splendidly renovated interiors and expansive grounds.

price_range.notes: 3-day exclusive rental including accommodation for 16 guests, private chef, and staff

venues.name: Chateau de Tourreau
venues.description: An 18th-century masterpiece set within a 20-acre estate, seamlessly blending historic grandeur with modern comfort. Features elegant salons, a consecrated chapel dating from 1614, stately gardens, a swimming pool, and tennis courts. Previously hosted Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas's wedding.

price_range.notes: Minimum 4 days and 3 nights rental

venues.name: Chateau les Crostes
venues.address: 2086 Chemin de Saint Louis, 83510 Lorgues, France
venues.description: A 17th-century estate surrounded by 220 hectares of forest with 55 hectares of award-winning vineyards. Located near Lorgues, just 40km from Saint-Tropez. Now managed by Prince Felix and Princess Claire of Luxembourg. Features romantic waterlily lake, olive groves, and no curfew restrictions.

venues.name: Le Mas de la Rose
venues.description: A charming 17th-century country chateau surrounded by a 20-hectare park of olive trees, oak trees, and lavender fields. Features 12 luxury rooms, an 18x8m pool with waterfall and jacuzzi, tennis courts, and is set within the Alpilles Regional Natural Park near Saint-Remy-de-Provence.

price_range.notes: Full privatization starts from 10,000 EUR

venues.name: Domaine de Fontenille
venues.description: A restored 17th-century bastide surrounded by 35 hectares of vineyards in the Luberon. Features vaulted salons, panoramic terraces, vine-covered gardens, 25 rooms and suites, and one of the oldest vineyards in the Luberon. Holds Relais & Chateaux designation and 2 Michelin Keys.

price_range.notes: 3-day event budget including venue rental and catering

venues.name: Domaine de Lamanon
venues.address: 1486 Chemin du Jas des Barres, 13113 Lamanon, France
venues.description: An authentic family-run 15th-century Provencal mas restored with heritage craftsmen, set within a verdant 20-hectare estate. Features 7 en-suite bedrooms, offering total peace and privacy. Owners returned from New York with a focus on generous hospitality.

price_range.notes: 3-night weekday rental from 8,500 EUR

venues.name: Airelles Gordes, La Bastide
venues.description: A luxury palace hotel perched in the hilltop village of Gordes, offering breathtaking views of the Luberon Valley. Features elegant reception spaces, refined Provencal cuisine, and the picturesque backdrop of one of France's most beautiful villages.

venues.name: Chateau de Berne
venues.description: A wine-producing estate and boutique hotel on a private domain amongst 600 hectares of vineyards. Features elegant reception rooms, a 500-seat amphitheater, the Jardin du Jasmin outdoor terraced area, and Salle de Bacchus ballroom. Ranked among World's 50 Best Vineyards.

price_range.notes: Exclusive use fee for weddings varies by season

venues.name: Chateau de Robernier
venues.description: A privately owned 16th-century chateau surrounded by vineyards and olive groves, carefully restored to preserve historic features. Features a consecrated 18th-century chapel, tree-lined courtyard, grand ballroom with chandeliers, swimming pool, and tennis court. Music permitted until 4am.

venues.name: Villa Ephrussi de Rothschild
venues.address: 1 Avenue Ephrussi de Rothschild, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, France
venues.description: A magnificent Belle Epoque palace built 1907-1912 by Baroness Beatrice de Rothschild, surrounded by nine themed gardens including French, Spanish, Japanese, and rose gardens. Features panoramic Mediterranean views, elegant salons, and is located on the prestigious Cap Ferrat peninsula.

price_range.notes: 24-hour privatization from 80,000-111,000 EUR; total wedding budgets from 230,000 EUR

venues.name: Chateau Saint-Martin & Spa
venues.description: A former 12th-century Knights Templar Commandery, now a 5-star Oetker Collection jewel set in a 32-acre park. Features 52 rooms and suites, a 12th-century chapel with contemporary mural, Michelin-starred restaurant, and stunning views where sea and mountains unite.

price_range.notes: Hotel hire including all 47 rooms for minimum 2 days

venues.name: Grand-Hotel du Cap-Ferrat, A Four Seasons Hotel
venues.address: 71 Boulevard du General de Gaulle, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, France
venues.description: A legendary 5-star Four Seasons property on 7 hectares overlooking the Mediterranean Sea between Nice and Monaco. Features 75 rooms and suites, Club Dauphin pool deck, panoramic terraces, and Michelin-starred dining. One of the most prestigious wedding venues on the French Riviera.

price_range.notes: Partial privatization from 40,000-74,000 EUR; full wedding budget from 250,000 EUR

venues.name: Hotel du Cap-Eden-Roc
venues.address: Boulevard J. F. Kennedy, Antibes, France
venues.description: An iconic luxury resort on 22 ocean-view acres on the tip of Cap d'Antibes, between Nice and Cannes. Features 115 rooms and 3 villas, the legendary Eden-Roc Pavilion, Grande Allee for ceremonies, and a private pontoon. A favorite of celebrities and royalty since 1870.

price_range.notes: Exclusive buyout required for large weddings; available April-May and September

venues.name: Chateau Diter
venues.address: 52 du Chemin du Vivier, 06130 Grasse, France
venues.description: A palatial chateau in the perfume capital of Grasse, featuring ornate Florentine-inspired architecture, manicured gardens, and stunning views of the French Riviera. Popular choice for multi-day celebrations on the Cote d'Azur.

venues.name: Chateau de Villette
venues.description: Nicknamed 'Le Petit Versailles,' this 17th-century chateau designed by Francois Mansart sits in a 75-hectare woodland park with two lakes and a cascade fountain. Featured in The Da Vinci Code. Gardens by Andre Le Notre. A classified historical landmark since 1942.

price_range.notes: Single-day wedding from 24-30,000 EUR; minimum 2-night stay from 9,000 EUR/night

venues.name: Chateau de Vallery
venues.description: An Early Renaissance chateau built in 1548 by Pierre Lescot, architect of the Louvre. Features 4 grandiose historical halls, 28 rooms, heated swimming pool, tennis court, and torch-lit lavish gardens. No curfew policy allows celebrations until dawn.

price_range.notes: Promotional rate from 18,000 EUR before VAT

venues.name: Chateau de Vaux-le-Vicomte
venues.description: The largest private chateau in France with 1,235 acres of gardens designed by Andre Le Notre. Built for Nicolas Fouquet and later inspiring Versailles. Features the Grand Salon, candlelit evening events, and ceremonial rooms. An ultra-exclusive venue for royal-level celebrations.

price_range.notes: Average wedding budget around 1 million EUR; rental fees from 50,000 EUR

venues.name: Domaine de Primard
venues.description: A charming estate near Paris and Giverny, part of the Fontenille Collection. Features beautifully restored interiors, elegant gardens, and a serene countryside setting perfect for intimate celebrations just outside the capital.

venues.name: Chateau Challain
venues.description: Built in 1854 by the eminent La Rochefoucauld family, this Neo-Gothic fairytale castle features 4 towers representing the seasons, 12 turrets for each month, and 365 windows. Spans 7,600 square meters with 72 acres of gardens, forest, and lake. Rated Excellent on TripAdvisor.

price_range.notes: Inclusive 2-night, 3-day exclusive use for 50 guests from 48,000 EUR

venues.name: Chateau du Grand-Luce
venues.address: 7 Place du Chateau, 72150 Le Grand-Luce, France
venues.description: A neoclassical French icon built in 1760, exquisitely restored with 45,000 square feet of chateau space. Features 80 acres of classical French gardens, an orangerie, spa, ballroom, and potager garden. Offers refined farm-to-table dining and holds 3 Michelin Keys.

price_range.notes: Full buyout from 25,000 EUR per night, 2-night minimum

venues.name: Chateau de Jalesnes
venues.description: A 16th-century Renaissance castle built in 1610, set within 20 acres of UNESCO-listed Loire Valley parkland. Features the restored Chapel of Saint Louis with original stained glass, swimming pool, formal gardens, and can accommodate 65 overnight guests. As seen on Escape to the Chateau DIY.

price_range.notes: Dream Wedding package from 45,000 EUR for 3-night stay, 30 guests

venues.name: Chateau de la Bourdaisiere
venues.address: 25 Rue de la Bourdaisiere, 37270 Montlouis-sur-Loire, France
venues.description: A charming 3-star chateau hotel midway between Tours and Amboise, known for stunning grounds and picturesque architecture. Features a 320 sqm vaulted reception room, outdoor altar in the gardens, small chapel, and 31 hotel rooms. Over three decades of hosting weddings.

price_range.notes: Venue rental from 15,000 EUR including reception hall and 31 rooms

venues.name: Chateau Rigaud
venues.description: A fully staffed, exclusive-use medieval chateau surrounded by Bordeaux vines, 20 minutes from Saint-Emilion. Features Michelin-trained in-house chefs, in-house planners and florists, and 4 acres of landscaped gardens. Has hosted over 400 weddings including A-list celebrities and British royalty.

price_range.notes: All-inclusive packages with food, wine, and accommodation

venues.name: Chateau Lagorce
venues.description: A dream wedding chateau in the Entre Deux Mers region, 25 minutes from Bordeaux. Features 22 en-suite bedrooms, 4 ceremony location options including lakeside and private chapel, and has hosted over 300 unique weddings since 2004 with on-site wedding planner Anna.

venues.name: Chateau Gassies
venues.description: An exceptional 18th-century 14-hectare estate overlooking the city of Bordeaux from the hills of Latresne. Built in 1775, features a 190 sqm reception room, two heated swimming pools, spa, tennis courts, and 5 elegantly styled suites. Just 10 minutes from Bordeaux center.

price_range.notes: Winter from 15,000 EUR; 5-night summer stay up to 55,000 EUR

venues.name: Chateau de Vitry-la-Ville
venues.description: A 17th-century registered historical monument on a 17-hectare estate with creeks, ponds, moat, bridges, and French gardens by Andre Le Notre. Features stone and limestone architecture, violet Irish slate roofs, heated swimming pool, hammam, and fitness room.

venues.name: Domaine Les Crayeres
venues.description: A mythical Relais & Chateaux property in a 7-hectare park, built in 1904 for the Marquise de Polignac. Features 20 ornate rooms named after European royalty, 2-Michelin-starred restaurant Le Parc with 900 champagnes, and holds 3 Michelin Keys. Adjacent to famous Champagne houses.

venues.name: Chateau de la Couronne
venues.description: A luxury destination wedding venue on the border of Charente and Dordogne. Features 21 beautifully designed bedrooms, piano room for ceremonies, banquet hall, swimming pool, and private chef. Offers three-day wedding weekend experience with all-inclusive packages.

price_range.notes: Minimum spend 55,000 EUR for venue and catering over 3 days

venues.name: Chateau de Tilly
venues.description: A listed Historic Monument 4-star hotel and restaurant featuring 4 splendid salons and a newly built Orangerie. Can accommodate up to 400 guests with 21 comfortable bedrooms. Notable for having no curfew, allowing festivities to continue all night.

venues.name: Chateau de Carsix
venues.description: An 18th-century chateau renowned as one of the three most beautiful in the Eure department. Features 20 bedrooms, 19 bathrooms, its own chapel, and the Mirror Room for up to 100 guests. Built at the end of Louis XV's reign with side pavilions and elegant French architecture.

price_range.notes: From 2,000 EUR, minimum 3 nights; bring your own alcohol with no corkage

venues.name: La Dime de Giverny
venues.description: A 13th-century estate in the iconic village of Giverny, famous for Monet's gardens. Features refined interiors, peaceful gardens, and the romantic atmosphere of this artistic village. Perfect for intimate celebrations with a connection to Impressionist history.

venues.name: Chateau de Bagnols
venues.description: A 13th-century medieval treasure in the Beaujolais wine region, featuring impressive towers, original dry moat, honey-colored 'pierres dorees' stone, and dramatic entrance across a drawbridge. Now exclusively hosts private events and weddings. Located 20km northwest of Lyon.

price_range.notes: Suite rates from 349 EUR/night; wedding packages upon request

venues.name: Chateau Beloire
venues.description: A Loire Valley chateau near Saumur, perfect for magical weddings in France. Grand yet homely in equal measures, ideal for both lavish and relaxed celebrations. Set in the heart of the Loire Valley wine region.

price_range.notes: 2-night all-inclusive package from 50,000 EUR for 40 guests in high season

venues.name: Chateau de Rochecotte
venues.description: A romantic chateau in the Loire Valley offering elegant settings for private events and weddings. Features beautiful grounds, refined interiors, and the quintessential charm of the Loire Valley's UNESCO World Heritage landscape.

venues.name: Relais de Saint-Preuil
venues.description: A relaxed wedding venue in the heart of the Champagne/Cognac region embracing a laid-back, boho vibe with whitewashed buildings and stunning cypress trees. Offers a perfect blend of charming rusticness and French elegance.

venues.name: Le Clos de Beaurepaire
venues.description: A refined wedding venue in Champagne's Aube Valley offering exclusive 3-day celebrations with elegant barn receptions and onsite accommodation. Combines rustic charm with Champagne region sophistication.

venues.name: Chateau Comtesse Lafond
venues.description: An elegant Champagne estate in Epernay offering historic cellars, refined reception spaces, and exclusive wines. Located in the capital of Champagne, perfect for celebrations featuring the region's famous sparkling wines.

venues.name: Chateau de Mairy
venues.description: Hidden amidst the lush landscapes of Champagne, offering rustic charm combined with French elegance. Features the informal and relaxed atmosphere of a country house, perfect for a romantic, champagne-filled wedding weekend.

venues.name: Chateau Mathilde
venues.description: A striking chateau with red brickwork, ornate design, and space to sleep up to 45 guests. Beautifully restored and popular for smaller Normandy weddings. Combines fairy-tale architecture with comfortable modern amenities.

venues.name: Chateau de Villers-Bocage
venues.description: A bright and airy historic chateau that feels like stepping into a fairy tale. Features ornate topiaries, spacious lawns, and exceptional service. Known for its elegant architecture and beautiful gardens in the Normandy countryside.

venues.name: Le Grand Domaine d'Azur
venues.description: A seaside wedding venue on the French Riviera offering stunning Mediterranean views and elegant celebration spaces. Combines the glamour of the Cote d'Azur with intimate charm for destination weddings.

venues.name: Clos Saint Esteve
venues.description: A charming bed and breakfast property in Provence offering an intimate setting for weddings and special events. Features rustic Provencal charm with modern touches and a beautiful countryside location.

venues.name: Domaine de Valbonne
venues.description: A beautiful domaine offering weddings and events in the Provencal countryside. Features elegant grounds, refined reception spaces, and the warm hospitality characteristic of the South of France.

venues.name: Mas d'Arvieux
venues.description: A 16th-century Provencal estate near Saint-Remy offering historic stone architecture, lavender fields, and flexible spaces for refined celebrations. Combines authentic Provencal character with elegant wedding facilities.

venues.name: Bell Rec
venues.address: Venat Pins, s/n, 08310 Argentona, Barcelona, Spain
venues.description: A stately home built in 1940 offering exclusive spaces for luxury weddings near Barcelona. Features over 5,000 m of landscaped gardens with fountains, ponds, and terraces, alongside artistic interior rooms. One of the most renowned venues for luxury events in Barcelona with complete exclusivity for each celebration.
